70
71const StringtaString String_PArray::def_sep(", ");
72
73const StringtaString String_PArray::AsString(const StringtaString& sep) const {
74 if (size == 0) return _nilStringtaString();
75 // more efficient to know the length, so we don't resize...
76 int xlen = MAX(0, (size - 1) * sep.length())(((0) > ((size - 1) * sep.length())) ? (0) : ((size - 1) *
sep.length())); // for seps
77 int i;
78 for (i=0; i < size; ++i) xlen += FastEl(i).length();
79 StringtaString rval(0, xlen, '\0');
80 for (i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
81 if (i > 0)
82 rval.cat(sep);
83 rval.cat(FastEl(i));
84 }
85 return rval;
86}
87
88int String_PArray::FindContains(const StringtaString& op, int start) const {
89 int i;
90 if(start < 0) { // search backwards if start < 0
91 for(i=size-1; i>=0; i--) {
92 if(FastEl(i).contains(op))
93 return i;
94 }
95 }
96 else {
97 for(i=start; i<size; i++) {
98 if(FastEl(i).contains(op))
99 return i;
100 }
101 }
102 return -1;
103}
104
105int String_PArray::FindStartsWith(const StringtaString& op, int start) const {
106 int i;
107 if(start < 0) { // search backwards if start < 0
108 for(i=size-1; i>=0; i--) {
109 if(FastEl(i).startsWith(op))
110 return i;
111 }
112 }
113 else {
114 for(i=start; i<size; i++) {
115 if(FastEl(i).startsWith(op))
116 return i;
117 }
118 }
119 return -1;
120}
121
122void String_PArray::SetFromString(StringtaString str, const StringtaString& sep) {
123 Reset();
124 int pos = str.index(sep);
125 while (pos >= 0) {
126 Add(str.left(pos)); // could be empty
127 str = str.after(pos + sep.length() - 1);
128 pos = str.index(sep);
129 }
130 if (str.nonempty())
131 Add(str);
132}
133
134///////////////////////////////////////
135// NameVar_PArray
136
137const StringtaString NameVar_PArray::def_sep(", ");
138
139const StringtaString NameVar_PArray::AsString(const StringtaString& sep) const {
140 if (size == 0) return _nilStringtaString();
141 int i;
142 StringtaString rval;
143 for (i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
144 if (i > 0)
145 rval.cat(sep);
146 rval.cat(FastEl(i).GetStr());
147 }
148 return rval;
149}
150
151int NameVar_PArray::FindName(const StringtaString& op, int start) const {
152 int i;
153 if(start < 0) { // search backwards if start < 0
154 for(i=size-1; i>=0; i--) {
155 if(FastEl(i).name == op)
156 return i;
157 }
158 }
159 else {
160 for(i=start; i<size; i++) {
161 if(FastEl(i).name == op)
162 return i;
163 }
164 }
165 return -1;
166}
167
168int NameVar_PArray::FindNameContains(const StringtaString& op, int start) const {
169 int i;
170 if(start < 0) { // search backwards if start < 0
171 for(i=size-1; i>=0; i--) {
172 if(FastEl(i).name.contains(op))
173 return i;
174 }
175 }
176 else {
177 for(i=start; i<size; i++) {
178 if(FastEl(i).name.contains(op))
179 return i;
180 }
181 }
182 return -1;
183}
184
185int NameVar_PArray::FindValue(const Variant& op, int start) const {
186 int i;
187 if(start < 0) { // search backwards if start < 0
188 for(i=size-1; i>=0; i--) {
189 if(FastEl(i).value == op)
190 return i;
191 }
192 }
193 else {
194 for(i=start; i<size; i++) {
195 if(FastEl(i).value == op)
196 return i;
197 }
198 }
199 return -1;
200}
201
202int NameVar_PArray::FindValueContains(const StringtaString& op, int start) const {
203 int i;
204 if(start < 0) { // search backwards if start < 0
205 for(i=size-1; i>=0; i--) {
206 if(FastEl(i).value.toString().contains(op))
207 return i;
208 }
209 }
210 else {
211 for(i=start; i<size; i++) {
212 if(FastEl(i).value.toString().contains(op))
213 return i;
214 }
215 }
216 return -1;
217}
218
219Variant NameVar_PArray::GetVal(const StringtaString& nm) {
220 int idx = FindName(nm);
221 if(idx < 0) return _nilVariantVariant();
222 return FastEl(idx).value;
223}
224
225Variant NameVar_PArray::GetValDef(const StringtaString& nm, const Variant& def) {
226 int idx = FindName(nm);
227 if (idx < 0) return def;
228 return FastEl(idx).value;
229}
230
231
232bool NameVar_PArray::GetAllVals(const StringtaString& nm, String_PArray& vals) {
233 for(int i=0;i<size; i++) {
234 NameVar& nv = FastEl(i);
235 if(nv.name != nm) continue;
236 vals.Add(nv.value.toString());
237 }
238 return (vals.size == 0);
239}
240
241bool NameVar_PArray::SetVal(const StringtaString& nm, const Variant& vl) {
242 int idx = FindName(nm);
243 if(idx < 0) {
244 Add(NameVar(nm, vl));
245 return true;
246 }
247 else {
248 FastEl(idx).value = vl;
249 return false;
250 }
251}
252
253//////////////////////////
254// taiMiscCore //
255//////////////////////////
256
257extern "C" {
258 extern int rl_done;
259}
260
261#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
262TA_API taiMiscCore* taiMC_ = NULL__null;
263
264int taiMiscCore::rl_callback() {
265 QCoreApplication* app = QCoreApplication::instance();
266 if (taMisc::quitting) goto quit_exit;
267 if (app)
268 app->processEvents();
269 if (taMisc::quitting) goto quit_exit;
270 return 0; // ???
271
272quit_exit:
273 rl_done = 1;
274 return 0;
275}
276
277taiMiscCore* taiMiscCore::New(QObject* parent) {
278 taiMiscCore* rval = new taiMiscCore(parent);
279 rval->Init();
280 return rval;
281}
282
283void taiMiscCore::Quit(CancelOp cancel_op) {
284 static bool is_quitting = false;
285 if(is_quitting) return;
286 // good place to save config, regardless what happens
287 is_quitting = true;
288 if (tabMisc::root)
289 tabMisc::root->Save();
290
291 taMisc::quitting = (cancel_op == CO_NOT_CANCELLABLE) ?
292 taMisc::QF_FORCE_QUIT : taMisc::QF_USER_QUIT;
293 OnQuitting(cancel_op); // saves changes
294 if (cancel_op != CO_CANCEL) {
295#ifdef DMEM_COMPILE
296 MPI_Finalize();
297#endif
298 taThreadMgr::TerminateAllThreads(); // don't leave any active threads lying around
299 tabMisc::WaitProc_Cleanup();
300 if (taiMC_) {
301 taiMC_->Quit_impl(cancel_op);
302 }
303 }
304 if (cancel_op == CO_CANCEL) {
305 taMisc::quitting = taMisc::QF_RUNNING;
306 is_quitting = false;
307 }
308}
309
310void taiMiscCore::OnQuitting(CancelOp& cancel_op) {
311 if (taiMC_) {
312 taiMC_->OnQuitting_impl(cancel_op);
313 }
314 if (cancel_op == CO_CANCEL) {
315 taMisc::quitting = taMisc::QF_RUNNING;
316 }
317}
318
319int taiMiscCore::ProcessEvents() {
320 if (taMisc::in_event_loop) {
321 QCoreApplication::processEvents();
322 }
323 return 0;
324}
325
326int taiMiscCore::RunPending() {
327 if (taMisc::in_event_loop) {
328 if(QCoreApplication::hasPendingEvents()) {
329 QCoreApplication::processEvents();
330 return true;
331 }
332 }
333 return false;
334}
335
336void taiMiscCore::WaitProc() {
337 if(!taMisc::do_wait_proc && taMisc::err_cancel) { // only count if not calling back
338 taMisc::err_waitproc_cnt++;
339 if(taMisc::err_waitproc_cnt > taMisc::err_waitproc_thr) { // over threshold, cancel cancel
340 taMisc::err_cancel = false;
341 taMisc::err_waitproc_cnt = 0;
342 }
343 }
344 if(!taMisc::do_wait_proc) return;
345 taMisc::do_wait_proc = false; // reset at the START so other waitproc guys can get on the list from within the current waitproc
346 tabMisc::WaitProc();
347}
348
349taiMiscCore::taiMiscCore(QObject* parent)
350:inherited(parent)
351{
352}
353
354taiMiscCore::~taiMiscCore() {
355 if (taiMC_ == this)
356 taiMC_ = NULL__null;
357}
358
359void taiMiscCore::app_aboutToQuit() {
360//NOTE: Qt will not process any more events at this point!
361 if (timer)
362 timer->stop();
363 // do wait proc, to do final deferred deletes
364 WaitProc();
365}
366
367void taiMiscCore::CheckConfigResult_(bool ok) {
368//note: only called if !quiet, and if !ok only if confirm_success
369 if (ok) {
370 taMisc::Warning("No configuration errors were found.");
371 }
372 else {
373 taMisc::ConsoleOutput("/n/n", true, false); // helps group this block together
374 taMisc::Warning("Configuration errors were found:\n");
375 taMisc::ConsoleOutput("taMisc::last_check_msg", true, false);
376 // helps group this block together
377 }
378}
379
380const StringtaString taiMiscCore::classname() {
381 return StringtaString(QCoreApplication::instance()->applicationName());
382}
383
384void taiMiscCore::customEvent(QEvent* ev) {
385 if ((int)ev->type() == (int)CE_QUIT)
386 Quit(CO_NOT_CANCELLABLE);
387 else inherited::customEvent(ev);
388}
389
390int taiMiscCore::Exec() {
391 if (taMisc::in_event_loop) {
392 taMisc::Error("Attempt to enter event loop a second time!");
393 return 0;
394 }
395
396 // does idle processing in Qt
397 timer = new QTimer(this);
398 connect(timer, SIGNAL(timeout())"2""timeout()", this, SLOT(timer_timeout())"1""timer_timeout()");
399 timer->start(taMisc::wait_proc_delay);
400 // need a number here to prevent constant busy loop running
401 // this must not have a number in it, so that it happens only
402 // when other events are DONE!
403
404 taMisc::in_event_loop = true;
405 int rval = 0;
406 try {
407 rval = Exec_impl();
408 } catch(...) {
409 taMisc::in_event_loop = false;
410 raise(SIGABRT6);
411 }
412 taMisc::in_event_loop = false;
413 return rval;
414}
415
416int taiMiscCore::Exec_impl() {
417 return QCoreApplication::instance()->exec();
418}
419
420void taiMiscCore::Init(bool gui) {
421 taMisc::gui_active = gui;
422
423 connect(QCoreApplication::instance(), SIGNAL(aboutToQuit())"2""aboutToQuit()",
424 this, SLOT(app_aboutToQuit())"1""app_aboutToQuit()" );
425
426 // initialize the type system
427 taiTypeBase::InitializeTypes(gui);
428}
429
430void taiMiscCore::OnQuitting_impl(CancelOp& cancel_op) {
431 // nothing in nongui
432}
433
434void taiMiscCore::PostUpdateAfter() {
435#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
436 dumpMisc::PostUpdateAfter();
437#endif
438}
439
440void taiMiscCore::Quit_impl(CancelOp cancel_op) {
441 // only for nogui
442 QCoreApplication::instance()->quit();
443}
444
445void taiMiscCore::timer_timeout() {
446 if (taMisc::WaitProc)
447 taMisc::WaitProc();
448}
449
450
451#endif // NO_TA_BASE
452
453InitProcRegistrar::InitProcRegistrar(init_proc_t init_proc) {
454 taMisc::AddInitHook(init_proc);
455}
456
457void taVersion::setFromString(StringtaString ver) {
458 Clear();
459 // parse, mj.mn.st-build -- just blindly go through, harmless if missings
460 major = BeforeOrOf('.', ver);
461 minor = BeforeOrOf('.', ver);
462 step = BeforeOrOf('-', ver);
463 build = BeforeOrOf(' ', ver); //dummy
464}
465
466int taVersion::BeforeOrOf(char sep, StringtaString& in) {
467 StringtaString s = in.before(sep);
468 if (s.nonempty()) {
469 in = in.after(sep);
470 } else {
471 s = in;
472 in = _nilStringtaString();
473 }
474 // strip any gunk, which may be at end, ex "b1" etc.
475 int i = 0;
476 while (i < s.length()) {
477 char c = s[i];
478 if (!isdigit(c)) break;
479 ++i;
480 }
481 return s.left(i).toInt();
482}

537# else

542#endif

544taThreadDefaults::taThreadDefaults() {
545 cpus = 1;
546 n_threads = -1;
547 alloc_pct = 0.0f;
548 min_units = 3000;
549 compute_thr = 0.5f;
550 nibble_chunk = 8;
551}

674NamedURL taMisc::wiki6_url;

681NameVar_PArray taMisc::proj_template_paths;
682NameVar_PArray taMisc::named_paths;

684DumpFileCvtList taMisc::file_converters;

687ostream* taMisc::record_script = NULL__null;

690#ifdef TA_OS_WIN

692StringtaString taMisc::edit_cmd = "Notepad.exe \"%s\"";
693StringtaString taMisc::plugin_make_env_cmd = "call \"C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\\VC\\vcvarsall.bat\" x86";
694#else
695#ifdef TA_OS_MAC
696StringtaString taMisc::edit_cmd = "emacs \"%s\" &";
697#else // prob Linux, or some Unix for sure
698StringtaString taMisc::edit_cmd = "emacs \"%s\" &";
699#endif
700#endif

758int taMisc::err_cancel_time_thr = 2;
759int taMisc::err_waitproc_cnt = 0;
760int taMisc::err_waitproc_thr = 100;

790/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
791// taMisc funs
792
793/////////////////////////////////////////////////
794// Configuration -- object as settings
795
796void taMisc::SaveConfig() {
797#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
798 UpdateAfterEdit();
799 ++taFiler::no_save_last_fname;
800 StringtaString cfgfn = prefs_dir + PATH_SEPtaPlatform::pathSep + "options" + app_suffix;
801 fstream strm;
802 strm.open(cfgfn, ios::out);
803 TA_taMisc.Dump_Save_Value(strm, (void*)this);
804 strm.close(); strm.clear();
805 --taFiler::no_save_last_fname;
806#endif
807}
808
809void taMisc::LoadConfig() {
810#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
811 ++taFiler::no_save_last_fname;
812 StringtaString cfgfn = prefs_dir + PATH_SEPtaPlatform::pathSep + "options" + app_suffix;
813 if(!QFile::exists(cfgfn)) { // try without app suffix!
814 cfgfn = prefs_dir + PATH_SEPtaPlatform::pathSep + "options";
815 }
816 fstream strm;
817 strm.open(cfgfn, ios::in);
818 if(!strm.bad() && !strm.eof())
819 TA_taMisc.Dump_Load_Value(strm, (void*)this);
820 strm.close();
821 strm.clear();
822 --taFiler::no_save_last_fname;
823 UpdateAfterEdit();
824#endif
825}
826
827void taMisc::UpdateAfterEdit() {
828#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
829 wikis.Reset();
830 if(wiki1_url.name.nonempty() && wiki1_url.url.nonempty()) {
831 wikis.Add(NameVar(wiki1_url.name, wiki1_url.url));
832 }
833 if(wiki2_url.name.nonempty() && wiki2_url.url.nonempty()) {
834 wikis.Add(NameVar(wiki2_url.name, wiki2_url.url));
835 }
836 if(wiki3_url.name.nonempty() && wiki3_url.url.nonempty()) {
837 wikis.Add(NameVar(wiki3_url.name, wiki3_url.url));
838 }
839 if(wiki4_url.name.nonempty() && wiki4_url.url.nonempty()) {
840 wikis.Add(NameVar(wiki4_url.name, wiki4_url.url));
841 }
842 if(wiki5_url.name.nonempty() && wiki5_url.url.nonempty()) {
843 wikis.Add(NameVar(wiki5_url.name, wiki5_url.url));
844 }
845 if(wiki6_url.name.nonempty() && wiki6_url.url.nonempty()) {
846 wikis.Add(NameVar(wiki6_url.name, wiki6_url.url));
847 }
848#endif
849}
850
851/////////////////////////////////////////////////
852// Errors, Warnings, Simple Dialogs
853
854bool taMisc::ErrorCancelCheck() {
855#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
856 if(taMisc::err_cancel) {
857 QDateTime tm = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
858 QDateTime st;
859 st.setTime_t(err_cancel_time);
860 if(st.secsTo(tm) < err_cancel_time_thr) {
861 taMisc::ConsoleOutputChars("+", true, false);
862 err_waitproc_cnt = 0; // reset counter and start counting again
863 }
864 else {
865 taMisc::ConsoleOutputChars(".", true, false);
866 }
867 err_cancel_time = tm.toTime_t();
868 }
869#endif
870 return taMisc::err_cancel;
871}
872
873bool taMisc::ErrorCancelSet(bool on) {
874 if(on) {
875 taMisc::err_cancel = true;
876#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
877 QDateTime tm = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
878 err_cancel_time = tm.toTime_t();
879#endif
880 taMisc::Info("Cancelling remaining error messages in this batch");
881 }
882 else {
883 taMisc::err_cancel = false;
884 taMisc::err_waitproc_cnt = 0;
885 }
886 return taMisc::err_cancel;
887}
888
889int taMisc::CheckClearErrCnt() {
890 int rval = err_cnt;
891 err_cnt = 0;
892 return rval;
893}
894
895void taMisc::Warning(const char* a, const char* b, const char* c, const char* d,
896 const char* e, const char* f, const char* g, const char* h, const char* i)
897{
898#if defined(DMEM_COMPILE)
899//TODO: should provide a way to log these somehow
900// if(taMisc::dmem_proc > 0) return;
901#endif
902 taMisc::last_warn_msg = SuperCat(a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i);
903#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
904 if(cssMisc::cur_top && !taMisc::is_loading) {
905 taMisc::last_warn_msg += StringtaString("\n") + cssMisc::GetSourceLoc(NULL__null);
906 if(cssMisc::cur_top->own_program) {
907 bool running = cssMisc::cur_top->state & cssProg::State_Run;
908 cssMisc::cur_top->own_program->taWarning(cssMisc::GetSourceLn(NULL__null), running,
909 taMisc::last_err_msg);
910 }
911 }
912#endif
913 StringtaString wmsg = "***WARNING: " + taMisc::last_warn_msg;
914 taMisc::LogEvent(wmsg);
915 taMisc::ConsoleOutput(wmsg, true, false);
916}
917
918void taMisc::Info(const char* a, const char* b, const char* c, const char* d,
919 const char* e, const char* f, const char* g, const char* h, const char* i)
920{
921#if defined(DMEM_COMPILE)
922//TODO: should provide a way to log these somehow
923 if(taMisc::dmem_proc > 0) return;
924#endif
925 StringtaString msg = SuperCat(a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i);
926 taMisc::LogEvent(msg);
927 taMisc::ConsoleOutput(msg, false, false); // no pager
928}
929
930StringtaString taMisc::SuperCat(const char* a, const char* b, const char* c,
931 const char* d, const char* e, const char* f,
932 const char* g, const char* h, const char* i)
933{
934 STRING_BUF(s, 250)taString s(0, 250, '\0');
935 s.cat(a); if(b) s.cat(" ").cat(b); if(c) s.cat(" ").cat(c);
936 if(d) s.cat(" ").cat(d); if(e) s.cat(" ").cat(e); if(f) s.cat(" ").cat(f);
937 if(g) s.cat(" ").cat(g); if(h) s.cat(" ").cat(h); if(i) s.cat(" ").cat(i);
938 return s;
939}
940
941void taMisc::CheckError(const char* a, const char* b, const char* c, const char* d,
942 const char* e, const char* f, const char* g, const char* h, const char* i)
943{
944#if !defined(NO_TA_BASE) && defined(DMEM_COMPILE)
945 // if(taMisc::dmem_proc > 0) return;
946#endif
947 // always send to console
948 StringtaString msg = SuperCat(a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i);
949 StringtaString fmsg = "***CHECK ERROR: " + msg;
950 taMisc::LogEvent(fmsg);
951 taMisc::ConsoleOutput(fmsg, true, false); // no pager
952 if (is_checking) {
953 last_check_msg.cat(msg).cat("\n");
954 } else {
955 last_check_msg = msg;
956 }
957}
958
959#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
960bool taMisc::TestError(const taBase* obj, bool test, const char* fun_name,
961 const char* a, const char* b, const char* c, const char* d,
962 const char* e, const char* f, const char* g, const char* h) {
963 static taBase* prv_obj = NULL__null;
964 static StringtaString prv_fun;
965 static StringtaString prv_a;
966
967 if(!test) return false;
968
969#ifdef DMEM_COMPILE
970 // if(taMisc::dmem_proc > 0) return true;
971#endif
972
973 if(obj) {
974 StringtaString objinfo = "Error in: " + obj->GetTypeDef()->name + " " + obj->GetDisplayName() + "::" + fun_name
975 + "() (path: " + obj->GetPathNames() + ")\n";
976
977 if((obj == prv_obj) && (prv_fun == fun_name) && (prv_a == a)) {
978 // nogui version for repeat!
979 taMisc::Error_nogui(objinfo, a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h);
980 }
981 else {
982 // default gui version
983 taMisc::Error(objinfo, a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h);
984 }
985 }
986 else {
987 StringtaString fn = StringtaString("Function: ") + fun_name + "()\n";
988 if((prv_fun == fun_name) && (prv_a == a)) {
989 // nogui version for repeat!
990 taMisc::Error_nogui(fn, a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h);
991 }
992 else {
993 // default gui version
994 taMisc::Error(fn, a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h);
995 }
996 }
997 prv_obj = const_cast<taBase*>(obj);
998 prv_fun = fun_name;
999 prv_a = a;
1000 return true;
1001}
1002
1003bool taMisc::TestWarning(const taBase* obj, bool test, const char* fun_name,
1004 const char* a, const char* b, const char* c, const char* d,
1005 const char* e, const char* f, const char* g, const char* h) {
1006 if(!test) return false;
1007 if(obj) {
1008 StringtaString objinfo = obj->GetTypeDef()->name + " " + obj->GetDisplayName() + "::" + fun_name
1009 + "() (path: " + obj->GetPathNames() + ")\n";
1010 taMisc::Warning(objinfo, a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h);
1011 }
1012 else {
1013 StringtaString fn = StringtaString("Function: ") + fun_name + "()\n";
1014 taMisc::Warning(fn, a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h);
1015 }
1016 return true;
1017}
1018#endif
1019
1020void taMisc::Error_nogui(const char* a, const char* b, const char* c, const char* d,
1021 const char* e, const char* f, const char* g, const char* h, const char* i)
1022{
1023 ++err_cnt;
1024#if !defined(NO_TA_BASE) && defined(DMEM_COMPILE)
1025 // this is actually a bad idea -- can miss ideosynchratic errors, and if you
1026 // get an error these days it is terminal anyway, so just bail!!
1027// if(taMisc::dmem_proc > 0) return;
1028#endif
1029 // if (beep_on_error) cerr << '\a'; // BEL character
1030 taMisc::last_err_msg = SuperCat(a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i);
1031#if !defined(NO_TA_BASE)
1032 if(cssMisc::cur_top) {
1033 taMisc::last_err_msg += StringtaString("\n") + cssMisc::GetSourceLoc(NULL__null);
1034 }
1035#endif
1036 StringtaString fmsg = "***ERROR: " + taMisc::last_err_msg;
1037 taMisc::LogEvent(fmsg);
1038 taMisc::ConsoleOutput(fmsg, true, false);
1039#if !defined(NO_TA_BASE)
1040 if(cssMisc::cur_top) {
1041 if(cssMisc::cur_top->own_program) {
1042 bool running = cssMisc::cur_top->state & cssProg::State_Run;
1043 cssMisc::cur_top->own_program->taError(cssMisc::GetSourceLn(NULL__null), running,
1044 taMisc::last_err_msg);
1045 }
1046 cssMisc::cur_top->run_stat = cssEl::ExecError; // tell css that we've got an error
1047 cssMisc::cur_top->exec_err_msg = taMisc::last_err_msg;
1048 }
1049#endif
1050}
1051
1052#ifdef TA_NO_GUI
1053// we put the no-gui versions here, to avoid dragging in all the gui stuff
1054// the gui versions are in ta_type_qt.cc
1055
1056void taMisc::Error(const char* a, const char* b, const char* c, const char* d,
1057 const char* e, const char* f, const char* g, const char* h, const char* i)
1058{
1059 Error_nogui(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i);
1060}
1061
1062int taMisc::Choice(const char* text, const char* a, const char* b, const char* c,
1063 const char* d, const char* e, const char* f, const char* g, const char* h, const char* i)
1064{
1065 int m=-1;
1066#if !defined(NO_TA_BASE) && defined(DMEM_COMPILE)
1067 if(taMisc::dmem_proc > 0) return -1;
1068#endif
1069 {
1070 int chn = 0;
1071 StringtaString chstr = text;
1072 chstr += "\n";
1073 if (a) { chstr += StringtaString("0: ") + a + "\n"; chn++; }
1074 if (b) { chstr += StringtaString("1: ") + b + "\n"; chn++; }
1075 if (c) { chstr += StringtaString("2: ") + c + "\n"; chn++; }
1076 if (d) { chstr += StringtaString("3: ") + d + "\n"; chn++; }
1077 if (e) { chstr += StringtaString("4: ") + e + "\n"; chn++; }
1078 if (f) { chstr += StringtaString("5: ") + f + "\n"; chn++; }
1079 if (g) { chstr += StringtaString("6: ") + g + "\n"; chn++; }
1080 if (h) { chstr += StringtaString("7: ") + h + "\n"; chn++; }
1081 if (i) { chstr += StringtaString("8: ") + i + "\n"; chn++; }
1082
1083 int choiceval = -1;
1084 while((choiceval < 0) || (choiceval > chn) ) {
1085 cout << chstr;
1086 StringtaString choice;
1087 cin >> choice;
1088 choiceval = atoi(choice);
1089 }
1090 m = choiceval;
1091 }
1092 return m;
1093}
1094
1095void taMisc::Confirm(const char* a, const char* b, const char* c,
1096 const char* d, const char* e, const char* f, const char* g,
1097 const char* h, const char* i)
1098{
1099#if !defined(NO_TA_BASE) && defined(DMEM_COMPILE)
1100 if (taMisc::dmem_proc > 0) return;
1101#endif
1102 StringtaString msg = SuperCat(a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i);
1103 {
1104 taMisc::LogEvent(msg);
1105 taMisc::ConsoleOutput(msg, false, false);
1106 }
1107}
1108
1109#endif // def TA_NO_GUI
1110
1111void taMisc::DebugInfo(const char* a, const char* b, const char* c, const char* d,
1112 const char* e, const char* f, const char* g, const char* h, const char* i)
1113{
1114 StringtaString ad = StringtaString("*** DEBUG: ") + a;
1115#ifdef DEBUG
1116 taMisc::Info(ad, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i);
1117#else
1118 StringtaString msg = SuperCat(ad, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i);
1119 taMisc::LogEvent(msg);
1120#endif
1121}
1122
1123void taMisc::LogInfo(const char* a, const char* b, const char* c, const char* d,
1124 const char* e, const char* f, const char* g, const char* h, const char* i)
1125{
1126 StringtaString ad = StringtaString("*** LOG: ") + a;
1127 StringtaString msg = SuperCat(ad, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i);
1128 taMisc::LogEvent(msg);
1129}
1130
1131void taMisc::LogEvent(const StringtaString& log_data) {
1132 time_t tmp = time(NULL__null);
1133 StringtaString tstamp = ctime(&tmp);
1134 tstamp = tstamp.before('\n');
1135 if(taMisc::log_stream.bad()) {
1136 if(taMisc::gui_active) {
1137 cout << tstamp << ": " << log_data << endl;
1138 }
1139 }
1140 else {
1141 taMisc::log_stream << tstamp << ": " << log_data << endl;
1142 }
1143}
1144
1145void taMisc::SetLogFile(const StringtaString& log_fn) {
1146 if(taMisc::log_fname == log_fn) return;
1147 taMisc::LogEvent("taMisc::SetLogFile -- Setting log file to: " + log_fn);
1148 taMisc::log_fname = log_fn;
1149 taMisc::log_stream.close();
1150 taMisc::log_stream.clear();
1151 taMisc::log_stream.open(log_fn, ios::out);
1152 if(taMisc::log_stream.bad()) {
1153 StringtaString bkup_fn = user_log_dir + "/default_project_log.plog";
1154 taMisc::Error("taMisc::SetLogFile -- Could not open log stream as:", log_fn,
1155 "reverting to default:", bkup_fn);
1156 taMisc::log_stream.close();
1157 taMisc::log_stream.clear();
1158 taMisc::log_stream.open(bkup_fn, ios::out);
1159 taMisc::log_fname = bkup_fn;
1160 }
1161 else {
1162 taMisc::LogEvent("taMisc::SetLogFile -- Log file opened for writing.");
1163 }
1164}
1165
1166void taMisc::EditFile(const StringtaString& filename) {
1167 StringtaString edtr = taMisc::edit_cmd; //don't run gsub on the original string!
1168 edtr.gsub("%s", filename);
1169 taPlatform::exec(edtr);
1170}
1171
1172/////////////////////////////////////////////////
1173// Global state management
1174
1175void taMisc::FlushConsole() {
1176#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
1177 if(!cssMisc::TopShell) return;
1178 cssMisc::TopShell->FlushConsole();
1179#endif
1180}
1181
1182// internal: output one line
1183static bool ConsoleOutputLine(const StringtaString& oneln, bool err, bool& pager, int& pageln) {
1184#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
1185 const char* prompt = "---Press Any Key to Continue, Except q = Quit, c = Continue without Paging ---";
1186
1187 if(cssMisc::TopShell) {
1188 cssMisc::TopShell->OutputLine(oneln, err);
1189 }
1190 else {
1191 if(err)
1192 cerr << oneln << endl;
1193 else
1194 cout << oneln << endl;
1195 }
1196 if(pager) {
1197 pageln++;
1198 if(pageln >= taMisc::display_height) {
1199 int resp = 0;
1200 if(cssMisc::TopShell) {
1201 resp = cssMisc::TopShell->QueryForKeyResponse(prompt);
1202 }
1203 else {
1204 cout << prompt << endl;
1205 resp = cin.get();
1206 }
1207 if(resp == 'q' || resp == 'Q') {
1208 return false;
1209 }
1210 if(resp == 'c' || resp == 'C') {
1211 pager = false;
1212 }
1213 pageln = 0; // start over
1214 }
1215 }
1216#else
1217 if(err)
1218 cerr << oneln << endl;
1219 else
1220 cout << oneln << endl;
1221#endif
1222 return true;
1223}
1224
1225bool taMisc::ConsoleOutput(const StringtaString& str, bool err, bool pager) {
1226 if(!taMisc::interactive) pager = false;
1227 int pageln = 0;
1228 StringtaString rmdr = str;
1229 do {
1230 StringtaString curln;
1231 if(rmdr.contains("\n")) {
1232 curln = rmdr.before("\n");
1233 rmdr = rmdr.after("\n");
1234 }
1235 else {
1236 curln = rmdr;
1237 rmdr = _nilStringtaString();
1238 }
1239 if(curln.length() > taMisc::display_width) {
1240 StringtaString longln = curln;
1241 bool was_wrap = false;
1242 do {
1243 // Reserve two characters for the end-of-line wrap marker, plus
1244 // (possibly) two characters for the beginning-of line wrap marker.
1245 int wrap_point = taMisc::display_width - 2;
1246 if (was_wrap) wrap_point -= 2;
1247
1248 StringtaString curpt = longln.before(wrap_point);
1249 longln = longln.from(wrap_point);
1250 if(was_wrap)
1251 curpt = "->" + curpt;
1252 if(longln.nonempty())
1253 curpt += "->";
1254 if(!ConsoleOutputLine(curpt, err, pager, pageln))
1255 return false; // user hit quit
1256 was_wrap = true;
1257 } while(longln.nonempty());
1258 }
1259 else {
1260 if(!ConsoleOutputLine(curln, err, pager, pageln))
1261 return false; // user hit quit
1262 }
1263 } while(rmdr.nonempty());
1264 return true;
1265}
1266
1267bool taMisc::ConsoleOutputChars(const StringtaString& str, bool err, bool pager) {
1268 console_chars << str;
1269 if((console_chars.length() >= taMisc::display_width-2) || str.contains("\n")) {
1270 ConsoleOutput(console_chars, err, pager);
1271 console_chars = _nilStringtaString(); // reset
1272 return true;
1273 }
1274 return false;
1275}
1276
1277int taMisc::ProcessEvents() {
1278#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
1279 return taiMiscCore::ProcessEvents();
1280#else
1281 return 0;
1282#endif
1283}
1284
1285int taMisc::RunPending() {
1286#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
1287 return taiMiscCore::RunPending();
1288#else
1289 return 0;
1290#endif
1291}
1292
1293
1294void taMisc::Busy(bool busy) {
1295#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
1296 if (taiMC_) taiMC_->Busy_(busy);
1297#endif
1298}
1299
1300void taMisc::CheckConfigStart(bool confirm_success, bool quiet) {
1301 // if first entry, do init stuff
1302 if (!taMisc::is_checking) {
1303 // always clear last msg, so there is no confusion after running Check
1304 taMisc::last_check_msg = _nilStringtaString();
1305 check_ok = true;
1306 check_quiet = quiet;
1307 check_confirm_success = confirm_success;
1308 taMisc::Busy();
1309 };
1310 ++taMisc::is_checking;
1311}
1312
1313void taMisc::CheckConfigEnd(bool ok) {
1314#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
1315 // failure always cumulative for all nestings
1316 if (!ok) check_ok = false;
1317 // if last exit, do notify stuff
1318 if (--taMisc::is_checking) return; // still checking
1319
1320 taMisc::DoneBusy();
1321 if (!check_quiet && (!check_ok || check_confirm_success)) {
1322 taiMC_->CheckConfigResult_(check_ok);
1323 }
1324#endif
1325}
1326
1327#if 1
1328// don't other with mallinfo for
1329StringtaString& taMisc::MallocInfo(StringtaString& strm) {
1330 strm << "Sorry memory usage statistics not available for this machine\n";
1331 return strm;
1332}
1333#else
1334StringtaString& taMisc::MallocInfo(StringtaString& strm) {
1335 static struct mallinfo prv_mi;
1336#if defined(SUN4) && !defined(__CLCC__)
1337 struct mallinfo mi = mallinfo(0);
1338#else
1339 struct mallinfo mi = mallinfo();
1340#endif
1341 strm << "Memory Allocation Information (and change since last call):\n" <<
1342"arena total space in arena "
1343<< mi.arena << "\t(" << mi.arena - prv_mi.arena << ")\n" <<
1344"ordblks number of ordinary blocks "
1345<< mi.ordblks << "\t(" << mi.ordblks - prv_mi.ordblks << ")\n" <<
1346"uordblks space in ordinary blocks in use "
1347<< mi.uordblks << "\t(" << mi.uordblks - prv_mi.uordblks << ")\n" <<
1348"fordblks space in free ordinary blocks "
1349<< mi.fordblks << "\t(" << mi.fordblks - prv_mi.fordblks << ")\n" <<
1350"smblks number of small blocks "
1351<< mi.smblks << "\t(" << mi.smblks - prv_mi.smblks << ")\n" <<
1352"usmblks space in small blocks in use "
1353<< mi.usmblks << "\t(" << mi.usmblks - prv_mi.usmblks << ")\n" <<
1354"fsmblks space in free small blocks "
1355<< mi.fsmblks << "\t(" << mi.fsmblks - prv_mi.fsmblks << ")\n" <<
1356"hblks number of holding blocks "
1357<< mi.hblks << "\t(" << mi.hblks - prv_mi.hblks << ")\n" <<
1358"hblkhd space in holding block headers "
1359<< mi.hblkhd << "\t(" << mi.hblkhd - prv_mi.hblkhd << ")\n" <<
1360"keepcost space penalty if keep option "
1361<< mi.keepcost << "\t(" << mi.keepcost - prv_mi.keepcost << ")\n";
1362 prv_mi = mi;
1363 return strm;
1364}
1365#endif
1366
1367StringtaString& taMisc::PrintAllTokens(StringtaString& strm) {
1368 return types.PrintAllTokens(strm);
1369}
1370
1371taMisc::TypeInfoKind taMisc::TypeToTypeInfoKind(TypeDef* td) {
1372 if (!td) return TIK_UNKNOWN;
1373
1374 TypeInfoKind tik;
1375#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
1376 if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_TypeDef)) tik = TIK_TYPE;
1377 else if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_MemberDef)) tik = TIK_MEMBER;
1378 else if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_PropertyDef)) tik = TIK_PROPERTY;
1379 else if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_MethodDef)) tik = TIK_METHOD;
1380 else if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_MemberSpace)) tik = TIK_MEMBERSPACE;
1381 else if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_MethodSpace)) tik = TIK_METHODSPACE;
1382 else if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_PropertySpace)) tik = TIK_PROPERTYSPACE;
1383 else if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_TypeSpace)) tik = TIK_TYPESPACE;
1384 else if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_EnumDef)) tik = TIK_ENUM;
1385 else if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_EnumSpace)) tik = TIK_ENUMSPACE;
1386 else if (td->InheritsFrom(&TA_TokenSpace)) tik = TIK_TOKENSPACE;
1387 else
1388#endif
1389 tik = TIK_UNKNOWN; // shouldn't happen
1390 return tik;
1391}
1392
1393void taMisc::Register_Cleanup(SIGNAL_PROC_FUN_ARG(fun)void (*fun)(int)) {
1394 // this should be the full set of terminal signals
1395// signal(SIGHUP, fun); // 1
1396//NOTE: SIGABRT is only ansi signal MS CRT really supports
1397 signal(SIGABRT6, fun); // 6
1398#ifndef TA_OS_WIN
1399 signal(SIGILL4, fun); // 4
1400 signal(SIGSEGV11, fun); // 11
1401 // signal(SIGINT, fun); // 2 -- this is caught by css!!
1402 signal(SIGQUIT3, fun); // 3
1403 signal(SIGBUS7, fun); // 7
1404 signal(SIGUSR110, fun); // 10
1405 signal(SIGUSR212, fun); // 12
1406# ifndef LINUX
1407 signal(SIGSYS31, fun);
1408# endif
1409 signal(SIGPIPE13, fun); // 13
1410 signal(SIGALRM14, fun); // 14
1411 signal(SIGTERM15, fun); // 15
1412 signal(SIGFPE8, fun);
1413#endif //!TA_OS_WIN
1414}
1415
1416void taMisc::Decode_Signal(int err) {
1417 StringtaString emsg;
1418 switch(err) {
1419 case SIGABRT6: emsg << "abort"; break;
1420#ifndef TA_OS_WIN
1421 case SIGHUP1: emsg << "hangup"; break;
1422 case SIGQUIT3: emsg << "quit"; break;
1423 case SIGILL4: emsg << "illegal instruction"; break;
1424 case SIGBUS7: emsg << "bus error"; break;
1425 case SIGSEGV11: emsg << "segmentation violation"; break;
1426# ifndef LINUX
1427 case SIGSYS31: emsg << "bad argument to system call"; break;
1428# endif
1429 case SIGPIPE13: emsg << "broken pipe"; break;
1430 case SIGALRM14: emsg << "alarm clock"; break;
1431 case SIGTERM15: emsg << "software termination signal"; break;
1432 case SIGFPE8: emsg << "floating point exception"; break;
1433 case SIGUSR110: emsg << "user signal 1"; break;
1434 case SIGUSR212: emsg << "user signal 2"; break;
1435#endif //!TA_OS_WIN
1436 default: emsg << "unknown"; break;
1437 }
1438 cerr << emsg; // nothing better to do in this situation -- don't go to console..
1439}
1440
1441
1442
1443/////////////////////////////////////////////////
1444// Startup
1445
1446void taMisc::Initialize() {
1447 not_constr = false;
1448}
1449
1450void taMisc::AddInitHook(init_proc_t init_proc) {
1451 if(!init_hook_list)
1452 init_hook_list = new taPtrList_impl;
1453 init_hook_list->Add_((void*)init_proc);
1454}
1455
1456#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
1457
1458void taMisc::Init_Hooks() {
1459 if(!init_hook_list) return;
1460 for (int i = 0; i < init_hook_list->size; ++i) {
1461 init_proc_t ip = (init_proc_t)init_hook_list->FastEl_(i);
1462 ip();
1463 }
1464}
1465
1466void taMisc::Init_Defaults_PreLoadConfig() {
1467 thread_defaults.cpus = taPlatform::cpuCount();
1468}
1469
1470void taMisc::Init_Defaults_PostLoadConfig() {
1471 // set any default settings after loading config file (ensures certain key settings in place)
1472 css_include_paths.AddUnique(app_dir + PATH_SEPtaPlatform::pathSep + "css_lib");
1473 css_include_paths.AddUnique(user_app_dir + PATH_SEPtaPlatform::pathSep + "css_lib");
1474 css_include_paths.AddUnique(user_app_dir); // for .init files in user app dir
1475 css_include_paths.AddUnique(user_dir); // needed for .init files **DEPRECATED**
1476
1477 prog_lib_paths.AddUnique(NameVar("SystemLib",
1478 (Variant)(app_dir + PATH_SEPtaPlatform::pathSep + "prog_lib")));
1479 prog_lib_paths.AddUnique(NameVar("UserLib",
1480 (Variant)(user_app_dir + PATH_SEPtaPlatform::pathSep + "prog_lib")));
1481 prog_lib_paths.AddUnique(NameVar("WebLib",
1482 (Variant)(web_home + "/prog_lib"))); //note: urls always use '/'
1483
1484 proj_template_paths.AddUnique(NameVar("SystemLib",
1485 (Variant)(app_dir + PATH_SEPtaPlatform::pathSep + "proj_templates")));
1486 proj_template_paths.AddUnique(NameVar("UserLib",
1487 (Variant)(user_app_dir + PATH_SEPtaPlatform::pathSep + "proj_templates")));
1488 proj_template_paths.AddUnique(NameVar("WebLib",
1489 (Variant)(web_home + "/proj_templates"))); //note: urls always use '/'
1490
1491 StringtaString curdir = GetCurrentPath();
1492 taMisc::load_paths.AddUnique(curdir);
1493
1494 // max_cpu
1495 int max_cpus = FindArgByName("MaxCpus").toInt(); // 0 if doesn't exist
1496 if ((max_cpus > 0) && (max_cpus <= taPlatform::cpuCount())) {
1497 thread_defaults.cpus = max_cpus;
1498 taMisc::Info("Set threads cpus:", StringtaString(max_cpus));
1499 }
1500
1501 if(thread_defaults.cpus > taPlatform::cpuCount())
1502 thread_defaults.cpus = taPlatform::cpuCount();
1503
1504 if(thread_defaults.n_threads == -1)
1505 thread_defaults.n_threads = thread_defaults.cpus;
1506
1507 int n_threads = FindArgByName("NThreads").toInt(); // 0 if doesn't exist
1508 if(n_threads > 0) {
1509 thread_defaults.n_threads = n_threads;
1510 taMisc::Info("Set n_threads to:", StringtaString(n_threads));
1511 }
1512 if(thread_defaults.n_threads > thread_defaults.cpus)
1513 thread_defaults.n_threads = thread_defaults.cpus;
1514
1515 if(CheckArgByName("ThreadAllocPct")) {
1516 float alc_pct = FindArgByName("ThreadAllocPct").toFloat();
1517 thread_defaults.alloc_pct = alc_pct;
1518 taMisc::Info("Set threads alloc_pct to:", StringtaString(alc_pct));
1519 }
1520
1521 int nib_chk = FindArgByName("ThreadNibbleChunk").toInt(); // 0 if doesn't exist
1522 if(nib_chk > 0) {
1523 thread_defaults.nibble_chunk = nib_chk;
1524 taMisc::Info("Set threads nibble_chunk to:", StringtaString(nib_chk));
1525 }
1526
1527 if(CheckArgByName("ThreadComputeThr")) {
1528 float cmp_thr = FindArgByName("ThreadComputeThr").toFloat();
1529 thread_defaults.compute_thr = cmp_thr;
1530 taMisc::Info("Set threads compute_thr to:", StringtaString(cmp_thr));
1531 }
1532
1533 int min_un = FindArgByName("ThreadMinUnits").toInt(); // 0 if doesn't exist
1534 if(min_un > 0) {
1535 thread_defaults.min_units = min_un;
1536 taMisc::Info("Set threads min_units to:", StringtaString(min_un));
1537 }
1538
1539 UpdateAfterEdit();
1540}
1541
1542void taMisc::Init_Args(int argc, const char* argv[]) {
1543 for(int i=0;i<argc;i++) {
1544 StringtaString av = argv[i];
1545 if(av.length() == 0) continue;
1546 while(av.contains(" -")) { // sometimes multiple flag args get munged together in scripts
1547 StringtaString frst = av.before(" -");
1548 av = av.from(" -");
1549 av = av.after(0); // skip space
1550 args_raw.Add(frst);
1551 }
1552 args_raw.Add(av);
1553 }
1554 UpdateArgs();
1555}
1556
1557void taMisc::Init_Types() {// called after all type info has been loaded into types
1558 // initialize all classes that have an initClass method (ex. Inventor subtypes)
1559 if(taMisc::use_gui) {
1560 for (int i = 0; i < types.size; ++i) {
1561 TypeDef* typ = types.FastEl(i);
1562 if ((typ->ptr > 0) || (typ->ref)) continue;
1563 // look for an initClass method
1564 MethodDef* md = typ->methods.FindName("initClass");
1565 if (!md)
1566 md = typ->methods.FindName("InitClass");
1567 if (!md) continue;
1568 if (!(md->is_static && md->addr && (md->arg_types.size == 0) )) continue;
1569 // call the init function
1570 md->addr();
1571 md->addr = NULL__null; // reset so it isn't run again!
1572 }
1573 }
1574 // add any Schema that couldn't be added earlier
1575 AddDeferredUserDataSchema();
1576 // other stuff could happen here..
1577
1578 // go through all types and create list of AKA typedefs
1579 for (int i = 0; i < types.size; ++i) {
1580 TypeDef* typ = types.FastEl(i);
1581 if(typ->OptionAfter("AKA_").nonempty()) {
1582 aka_types.Link(typ);
1583 }
1584 }
1585}
1586
1587void taMisc::AddUserDataSchema(const StringtaString& type_name, UserDataItemBase* item) {
1588 // calls could come very early in startup, even before .types or its contents
1589 // are created (static data gets created in "random" order in C++)
1590 // so we will add now if the type exists, otherwise we add to a deferred list
1591 TypeDef* typ = NULL__null;
1592 //TODO: gcc complains that &types is always true!
1593 if (&types) {
1594 typ = types.FindName(type_name);
1595 }
1596 if (typ) {
1597 typ->AddUserDataSchema(item);
1598 } else { // too early, or bad type_name
1599 if (!deferred_schema_names) {
1600 deferred_schema_names = new String_PArray;
1601 deferred_schema_items = new UserDataItem_List;
1602 }
1603 taBase::Ref(item); // extra ref so doesn't get deleted later
1604 deferred_schema_names->Add(type_name);
1605 deferred_schema_items->Link(item); // don't do the owner thang...
1606 }
1607}
1608
1609void taMisc::AddDeferredUserDataSchema() {
1610 if (!deferred_schema_names) return;
1611 StringtaString type_name;
1612 while (deferred_schema_names->size > 0) {
1613 type_name = deferred_schema_names->Pop();
1614 //note: has an extra refn, so not deleted on Pop
1615 UserDataItemBase* item = deferred_schema_items->Pop();
1616 TypeDef* typ = types.FindName(type_name);
1617 if (typ) {
1618 typ->AddUserDataSchema(item);
1619 } else {
1620 Warning("Type:", type_name, " not found trying to add UserDataSchema for key:",
1621 item->name);
1622 }
1623 taBase::UnRef(item); // only deleted if not added to new list
1624 }
1625 // don't need these anymore
1626 delete deferred_schema_names;
1627 deferred_schema_names = NULL__null;
1628 delete deferred_schema_items;
1629 deferred_schema_items = NULL__null;
1630}
1631
1632void taMisc::Init_DMem(int& argc, const char* argv[]) {
1633#if !defined(NO_TA_BASE) && defined(DMEM_COMPILE)
1634 MPI_Init(&argc, (char***)&argv); // note mpi's extra level of indirection
1635 MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &dmem_nprocs);
1636 MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &dmem_proc);
1637 MPI_Errhandler_set(MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_ERRORS_RETURN);
1638 if(dmem_proc == 0) {
1639 cerr << "DMEM Running on " << dmem_nprocs << " processors." << endl;
1640 }
1641#endif
1642}
1643
1644void taMisc::HelpMsg(ostream& strm) {
1645 strm << "TA/CSS Help Info, version: " << version << endl;
1646 strm << "Startup arguments: " << endl;
1647 for(int i=0;i<arg_names.size; i++) {
1648 NameVar nv = arg_names.FastEl(i);
1649 Variant dvar = arg_name_descs.GetVal(nv.value.toString());
1650 StringtaString desc = dvar.toString();
1651 strm << " " << nv.name << desc << endl;
1652 }
1653}
1654
1655void taMisc::UpdateArgs() {
1656 args.Reset();
1657 for(int i=0;i<args_raw.size;i++) {
1658 StringtaString av = args_raw[i];
1659 NameVar nv;
1660 if(av[0] == '-') { // a flag
1661 Variant vl = arg_names.GetVal(av);
1662 if(vl.isNull()) {
1663 nv.name = av;
1664 }
1665 else {
1666 nv.name = vl.toString();
1667 }
1668 if(i < args_raw.size-1) {
1669 StringtaString nxt = args_raw[i+1];
1670 if((nxt[0] != '-') && !nxt.contains('=')) {
1671 // not another flag or n=v; treat as value for this guy
1672 nv.value = nxt;
1673 }
1674 // don't consume this arg in any case: it will show up as argv[i+1] too
1675 }
1676 }
1677 else if(av.contains('=')) { // name=value arg
1678 nv.name = av.before('=');
1679 nv.value = av.after('=');
1680 Variant vl = arg_names.GetVal(nv.name + "="); // register "flag=" to convert to names
1681 if(!vl.isNull())
1682 nv.name = vl.toString();
1683 }
1684 else { // regular arg: enter name as argv[x]
1685 nv.name = "argv[" + StringtaString(i) + "]";
1686 nv.value = av;
1687 }
1688 args.Add(nv);
1689 }
1690}
1691
1692void taMisc::AddArgName(const StringtaString& flag, const StringtaString& nm) {
1693 taMisc::arg_names.Add(NameVar(flag, (Variant)nm));
1694}
1695
1696void taMisc::AddEqualsArgName(const StringtaString& arg_nm) {
1697 taMisc::arg_names.Add(NameVar(arg_nm + "=", (Variant)arg_nm));
1698}
1699
1700void taMisc::AddArgNameDesc(const StringtaString& nm, const StringtaString& desc) {
1701 taMisc::arg_name_descs.Add(NameVar(nm, (Variant)desc));
1702}
1703
1704StringtaString taMisc::FullArgString() {
1705 return args_raw.AsString(" ");
1706}
1707
1708bool taMisc::FullArgStringToFile(const StringtaString& fname) {
1709 if(taMisc::dmem_proc != 0) return true;
1710 StringtaString ars = args_raw.AsString(" ");
1711 fstream strm;
1712 strm.open(fname, ios::out);
1713 if(strm.bad()) {
1714 strm.close();
1715 strm.clear();
1716 return false;
1717 }
1718 strm << ars << endl;
1719 strm.close(); strm.clear();
1720 return true;
1721}
1722
1723
1724StringtaString taMisc::FullArgStringName(bool exclude_flags, const StringtaString& exclude_names,
1725 bool shorten_names, int max_len, int seg_len,
1726 int rm_vowels_thr,
1727 const StringtaString& nm_val_sep, const StringtaString& arg_sep,
1728 const StringtaString& space_repl, const StringtaString& period_repl,
1729 const StringtaString& slash_repl) {
1730
1731 String_PArray excludes;
1732 excludes.SetFromString(exclude_names, ", ");
1733
1734 StringtaString act_arg_sep = arg_sep;
1735 if(act_arg_sep.empty())
1736 act_arg_sep = "#"; // makea barfs if this is in the default args!
1737
1738 StringtaString rval;
1739 for(int i=1; i<args.size; i++) {
1740 NameVar nv = args[i];
1741 if(exclude_flags && nv.value.isNull()) continue;
1742 bool excl = false;
1743 for(int j=0; j<excludes.size; j++) {
1744 if(nv.name.contains(excludes[j])) {
1745 excl = true;
1746 break;
1747 }
1748 }
1749 if(excl) continue;
1750 StringtaString nm = nv.name;
1751 if(shorten_names) {
1752 nm = ShortName(nm, max_len, seg_len, rm_vowels_thr);
1753 }
1754 StringtaString vl = nv.value.toString();
1755 StringtaString nvs = nm + nm_val_sep + vl;
1756 nvs.gsub(" ", space_repl);
1757 nvs.gsub(".", period_repl);
1758 nvs.gsub("/", slash_repl);
1759 nvs.gsub("\\", slash_repl);
1760 if(rval.empty())
1761 rval = nvs;
1762 else
1763 rval.cat(act_arg_sep).cat(nvs);
1764 }
1765 return rval;
1766}
1767
1768
1769bool taMisc::CheckArgByName(const StringtaString& nm) {
1770 if(args.FindName(nm) < 0) return false;
1771 return true;
1772}
1773
1774StringtaString taMisc::FindArgByName(const StringtaString& nm) {
1775 Variant vl = args.GetVal(nm);
1776 if(vl.isNull()) return _nilStringtaString();
1777 return vl.toString();
1778}
1779
1780bool taMisc::GetAllArgsNamed(const StringtaString& nm, String_PArray& vals) {
1781 return taMisc::args.GetAllVals(nm, vals);
1782}
1783
1784bool taMisc::CheckArgValContains(const StringtaString& vl) {
1785 int idx = args.FindValueContains(vl);
1786 if(idx < 0) return false;
1787 return true;
1788}
1789
1790StringtaString taMisc::FindArgValContains(const StringtaString& vl) {
1791 int idx = args.FindValueContains(vl);
1792 if(idx < 0) return _nilStringtaString();
1793 return args.FastEl(idx).value.toString();
1794}
1795
1796#endif // NO_TA_BASE for al startup/args functions
1797
1798/////////////////////////////////////////////////
1799// Commonly used utility functions on strings/arrays/values
1800
1801void taMisc::CharToStrArray(String_PArray& sa, const char* ch) {
1802 StringtaString tmp = ch;
1803 while (!tmp.empty()) {
1804 sa.AddUnique(tmp.before(" "));
1805 tmp = tmp.after(" ");
1806 }
1807}
1808
1809StringtaString taMisc::StrArrayToChar(const String_PArray& sa) {
1810//NOTE: for historical reasons, this adds an extra sep on the end
1811// more efficient to know the length, so we don't resize...
1812 uint xlen = sa.size; // for seps
1813 int i;
1814 for (i=0; i < sa.size; i++) xlen += sa.FastEl(i).length();
1815 StringtaString tmp(0, xlen, '\0');
1816 for (i = 0; i < sa.size; i++) {
1817 tmp += sa.FastEl(i);
1818 tmp += " ";
1819 }
1820 return tmp;
1821}
1822
1823// add spaces to a label
1824void taMisc::SpaceLabel(StringtaString& lbl) {
1825 StringtaString tmp = lbl;
1826 lbl = "";
1827 int i;
1828 for(i=0; i<(int)tmp.length(); i++) {
1829 if((i > 0) && isupper(tmp[i]) && islower(tmp[i-1]))
1830 lbl += " ";
1831 else if(tmp[i] == '_') {
1832 lbl += " ";
1833 continue;
1834 }
1835 lbl += tmp[i];
1836 }
1837}
1838
1839StringtaString taMisc::LeadingZeros(int num, int len) {
1840 StringtaString rval = num;
1841 int rval_len = rval.length();
1842 StringtaString lead_zeros;
1843 int i;
1844 for(i=len; i>=1; i--) {
1845 if(i > rval_len)
1846 lead_zeros += "0";
1847 else
1848 break;
1849 }
1850 return lead_zeros + rval;
1851}
1852
1853StringtaString taMisc::FormatValue(float val, int width, int precision) {
1854 stringstream ss;
1855 ss.precision(precision);
1856 ss.width(width);
1857 ss << val;
1858 string str = ss.str();
1859 StringtaString sval = str.c_str();
1860 if((int)sval.length() > width)
1861 sval = sval.before(width);
1862 while((int)sval.length() < width) sval += " ";
1863 return sval;
1864// String sval(val);
1865// if(sval.contains('.')) {
1866// String digs = sval.after('.');
1867// sval = sval.through('.') + digs.at(0,MIN(precision,(int)digs.length()));
1868// if(digs.contains("e"))
1869// sval += digs.from('e');
1870// }
1871// if((int)sval.length() > width)
1872// sval = sval.before(width);
1873// return sval;
1874}
1875
1876StringtaString taMisc::StringMaxLen(const StringtaString& str, int len) {
1877 if((int)str.length() <= len) return str;
1878 StringtaString rval = ((StringtaString)str).before(len);
1879 return rval;
1880}
1881
1882StringtaString taMisc::StringEnforceLen(const StringtaString& str, int len) {
1883 if((int)str.length() >= len) {
1884 StringtaString rval = ((StringtaString)str).before(len);
1885 return rval;
1886 }
1887 StringtaString rval = str;
1888 while((int)rval.length() < len) rval += " ";
1889 return rval;
1890}
1891
1892StringtaString taMisc::RemoveVowels(const StringtaString& str) {
1893 StringtaString rval;
1894 int len = str.length();
1895 for(int i=0; i<len; i++) {
1896 char c = str[i];
1897 char lc = tolower(c);
1898 if(lc == 'a' || lc == 'e' || lc == 'i' || lc == 'o' || lc == 'u') continue;
1899 rval.cat(c);
1900 }
1901 return rval;
1902}
1903
1904StringtaString taMisc::ShortName(const StringtaString& name, int max_len, int seg_len, int rm_vowels_thr) {
1905 int ln = name.length();
1906 if(ln <= max_len) return name;
1907 StringtaString nm = name;
1908 if(ln >= rm_vowels_thr) {
1909 nm = RemoveVowels(name);
1910 ln = nm.length();
1911 }
1912 int_PArray brks; // locations of break points
1913 for(int i = 1; i < ln; i++) {
1914 char c = nm[i];
1915 if(c == ' ' || c == '_') {
1916 brks.Add(i);
1917 continue;
1918 }
1919 if(isupper(c) && islower(nm[i-1])) {
1920 brks.Add(i-1);
1921 continue;
1922 }
1923 }
1924 if(brks.size == 0)
1925 return StringMaxLen(nm, max_len);
1926 StringtaString rval;
1927 if(brks.size == 1) {
1928 StringtaString seg1 = nm.at(0, brks[0]);
1929 rval.cat(StringMaxLen(seg1, seg_len));
1930 int mln = max_len - rval.length();
1931 if(mln > 0) {
1932 StringtaString seg2 = nm.after(brks[0]);
1933 rval.cat(StringMaxLen(seg2, mln));
1934 }
1935 }
1936 if(brks.size > 1) {
1937 StringtaString seg1 = nm.at(0, brks[0]);
1938 rval.cat(StringMaxLen(seg1, seg_len));
1939 StringtaString seg2 = nm.at(brks[0]+1, brks[1]-brks[0]-1);
1940 rval.cat(StringMaxLen(seg2, seg_len));
1941 int mln = max_len - rval.length();
1942 if(mln > 0) {
1943 StringtaString seg2 = nm.at(brks[1]+1, ln-brks[1]-1);
1944 rval.cat(StringMaxLen(seg2, mln));
1945 }
1946 }
1947 return rval;
1948}
1949
1950
1951StringtaString taMisc::StringCVar(const StringtaString& str) {
1952 StringtaString rval;
1953 for(int i=0;i<str.length();i++) {
1954 char c = str[i];
1955 if(isalnum(c) || c == '_') {
1956 if(!(isdigit(c) && (rval.length()==0)))
1957 rval += c;
1958 }
1959 else {
1960 if((rval.length() > 0) && (rval.lastchar() != '_'))
1961 rval += '_'; // use _ to replace all strange chars
1962 }
1963 }
1964 return rval;
1965}
1966
1967StringtaString& taMisc::FancyPrintList(StringtaString& strm, const String_PArray& strs,
1968 int indent, int max_col_width, int n_per_line) {
1969 int max_wd = 0;
1970 for(int i=0; i<strs.size; i++) {
1971 max_wd = MAX(max_wd, strs[i].length())(((max_wd) > (strs[i].length())) ? (max_wd) : (strs[i].length
()));
1972 }
1973 max_wd = MIN(max_wd, max_col_width)(((max_wd) < (max_col_width)) ? (max_wd) : (max_col_width)
);
1974 max_wd = MAX(2, max_wd)(((2) > (max_wd)) ? (2) : (max_wd));
1975
1976 int max_wd_sp = max_wd + taMisc::indent_spc; // include spacing per item
1977
1978 int isp = taMisc::indent_spc*indent;
1979 if(n_per_line < 0) {
1980 n_per_line = (taMisc::display_width - isp) / max_wd_sp; // n per line
1981 if(n_per_line <= 0) n_per_line = 1;
1982 }
1983
1984 IndentString(strm, indent); // start indented
1985 int cur_wd = isp;
1986 int prln = 0;
1987 for(int i=0; i<strs.size; i++) {
1988 StringtaString& it = strs[i];
1989 int sln = it.length();
1990 if(MAX(sln,max_wd_sp)(((sln) > (max_wd_sp)) ? (sln) : (max_wd_sp)) + cur_wd > taMisc::display_width || prln >= n_per_line) {
1991 // cr if we're going over
1992 prln = 0;
1993 CrIndentString(strm, indent);
1994 cur_wd = isp;
1995 }
1996 strm << it;
1997 prln++;
1998 if(prln < n_per_line) {
1999 int trg_wd_sp = (int(sln / max_wd_sp)+1) * max_wd_sp;
2000 while(sln < trg_wd_sp) { strm << ' '; ++sln; }
2001 cur_wd += trg_wd_sp;
2002 }
2003 }
2004 strm << "\n"; // always terminate list
2005 return strm;
2006}
2007
2008StringtaString& taMisc::FancyPrintTwoCol(StringtaString& strm, const String_PArray& col1_strs,
2009 const String_PArray& col2_strs, int indent) {
2010 int max_wd = 0;
2011 for(int i=0; i<col1_strs.size; i++) {
2012 max_wd = MAX(max_wd, col1_strs[i].length())(((max_wd) > (col1_strs[i].length())) ? (max_wd) : (col1_strs
[i].length()));
2013 }
2014 max_wd = MAX(2, max_wd)(((2) > (max_wd)) ? (2) : (max_wd));
2015
2016 int max_wd_sp = max_wd + taMisc::indent_spc; // include spacing per item
2017
2018 int isp = taMisc::indent_spc*indent;
Value stored to 'isp' during its initialization is never read
2019 for(int i=0; i<col1_strs.size; i++) {
2020 taMisc::IndentString(strm, indent); // start indented
2021 StringtaString& it = col1_strs[i];
2022 int sln = it.length();
2023 strm << it;
2024 while(sln < max_wd_sp) { strm << ' '; ++sln; }
2025 strm << col2_strs[i];
2026 strm << "\n";
2027 }
2028 return strm;
2029}
2030
2031/////////////////////////////////////////////////
2032// File Paths etc
2033
2034TypeDef* taMisc::FindTypeName(const StringtaString& typ_nm) {
2035 TypeDef* td = taMisc::types.FindName(typ_nm);
2036 if(td != NULL__null) return td;
2037 for(int i=0; i<taMisc::aka_types.size; i++) {
2038 TypeDef* aka = taMisc::aka_types.FastEl(i);
2039 StringtaString aka_nm = aka->OptionAfter("AKA_");
2040 if(aka_nm == typ_nm) {
2041 return aka;
2042 }
2043 }
2044 taMisc::Warning("Unknown type:",typ_nm);
2045 return NULL__null;
2046}
2047
2048StringtaString taMisc::GetFileFmPath(const StringtaString& path) {
2049 return taPlatform::getFileName(path);
2050}
2051
2052StringtaString taMisc::GetDirFmPath(const StringtaString& path, int n_up) {
2053#ifdef NO_TA_BASE
2054 StringtaString pth = path;
2055#else
2056 StringtaString pth = QDir::fromNativeSeparators(path);
2057#endif
2058 if(!pth.contains('/')) return _nilStringtaString();
2059 StringtaString dir = pth.before('/',-1);
2060 for(int i=0;i<n_up;i++) {
2061 if(!dir.contains('/')) return _nilStringtaString();
2062 dir = dir.before('/',-1);
2063 }
2064#ifdef NO_TA_BASE
2065 return dir;
2066#else
2067 return QDir::toNativeSeparators(dir);
2068#endif
2069}
2070
2071StringtaString taMisc::GetHomePath() {
2072 return taPlatform::getHomePath();
2073}
2074
2075StringtaString taMisc::GetUserPluginDir() {
2076#ifdef TA_OS_WIN
2077 // Use a separate directory for 64-bit plugins. Otherwise, if the user has
2078 // both 32-bit emergent and 64-bit emergent installed, it can cause problems
2079 // with the Qt Plugin Cache, see:
2080 // http://doc.qt.nokia.com/stable/deployment-plugins.html#the-plugin-cache
2081 // The problem is that the 32-bit version of emergent might mark a 64-bit
2082 // plugin DLL as "bad" in the cache, thus preventing it from working with
2083 // the 64-bit version of emergent (and vice versa). Separating the DLLs
2084 // prevents 32-bit emergent from ever seeing a 64-bit DLL, so this can't
2085 // happen.
2086 if (sizeof(void *) >= 8) {
2087 return "plugins64";
2088 }
2089#endif
2090
2091 return "plugins";
2092}
2093
2094StringtaString taMisc::GetSysPluginDir() {
2095 // Not necessary to separate 32/64 here, since this directory only exists
2096 // within the directory emergent was installed to, which is already distinct
2097 // for 32-bit and 64-bit installations. Also, this directory is created by
2098 // the installer/CMake/CPack system, and would be more difficult to name
2099 // differently on Windows for 32 vs. 64.
2100 return "plugins";
2101}
2102
2103bool taMisc::FileExists(const StringtaString& fname) {
2104 return taPlatform::fileExists(fname);
2105}
2106
2107#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
2108int64_t taMisc::FileSize(const StringtaString& fname) {
2109 QFileInfo fi(fname);
2110 return fi.size();
2111}
2112
2113bool taMisc::FileWritable(const StringtaString& fname) {
2114 QFileInfo fi(fname);
2115 return fi.isWritable();
2116}
2117
2118bool taMisc::FileReadable(const StringtaString& fname) {
2119 QFileInfo fi(fname);
2120 return fi.isReadable();
2121}
2122
2123bool taMisc::FileExecutable(const StringtaString& fname) {
2124 QFileInfo fi(fname);
2125 return fi.isExecutable();
2126}
2127
2128bool taMisc::SetFilePermissions(const StringtaString& fname, bool user, bool group,
2129 bool other, bool readable, bool writable,
2130 bool executable) {
2131 QFile fi(fname);
2132 QFile::Permissions perm = 0;
2133 if(user && readable) perm |= QFile::ReadUser;
2134 if(user && writable) perm |= QFile::WriteUser;
2135 if(user && executable) perm |= QFile::ExeUser;
2136 if(group && readable) perm |= QFile::ReadGroup;
2137 if(group && writable) perm |= QFile::WriteGroup;
2138 if(group && executable) perm |= QFile::ExeGroup;
2139 if(other && readable) perm |= QFile::ReadOther;
2140 if(other && writable) perm |= QFile::WriteOther;
2141 if(other && executable) perm |= QFile::ExeOther;
2142 return fi.setPermissions(perm);
2143}
2144
2145bool taMisc::RenameFile(const StringtaString& old_fn, const StringtaString& new_fn) {
2146 QDir d;
2147 return d.rename(old_fn, new_fn);
2148}
2149
2150bool taMisc::RemoveFile(const StringtaString& fn) {
2151 QDir d;
2152 return d.remove(fn);
2153}

2156 return QDir::currentPath();
