7239 // I actually inherit from the other guy, need to use their type for copying!
7240 if((src->GetTypeDef() != this) && InheritsFrom(src->GetTypeDef())) {
7241 src->GetTypeDef()->CopyOnlySameType(trg_base, src_base);
7242 return;
7243 }
7244 }
7245#endif // NO_TA_BASE
7246 members.CopyOnlySameType(trg_base, src_base);
7247 }
7248 else
7249 CopyFromSameType(trg_base, src_base, memb_def);
7250}
7251
7252void TypeDef::MemberCopyFrom(int memb_no, void* trg_base, void* src_base) {
7253 if(memb_no < members.size)
7254 members[memb_no]->CopyFromSameType(trg_base, src_base);
7255}
7256
7257//////////////////////////////////
7258// CompareSameType //
7259//////////////////////////////////
7260
7261bool MemberSpace::CompareSameType(Member_List& mds, TypeSpace& base_types,
7262 voidptr_PArray& trg_bases, voidptr_PArray& src_bases,
7263 TypeDef* base_typ, void* trg_base, void* src_base,
7264 int show_forbidden, int show_allowed, bool no_ptrs,
7265 bool test_only) {
7266 bool some_diff = false;
7267 int i;
7268 for(i=0; i<size; i++) {
7269 MemberDef* md = FastEl(i);
7270 if(md->ShowMember(show_forbidden, TypeItem::SC_ANY, show_allowed)) {
7271 if(no_ptrs && (md->type->ptr > 0 || md->type->HasOption("SMART_POINTER"))) continue;
7272 some_diff |= md->CompareSameType(mds, base_types, trg_bases, src_bases,
7273 base_typ, trg_base, src_base,
7274 show_forbidden, show_allowed, no_ptrs, test_only);
7275 }
7276 }
7277 return some_diff;
7278}
7279
7280bool MemberDef::CompareSameType(Member_List& mds, TypeSpace& base_types,
7281 voidptr_PArray& trg_bases, voidptr_PArray& src_bases,
7282 TypeDef* base_typ, void* trg_base, void* src_base,
7283 int show_forbidden, int show_allowed, bool no_ptrs,
7284 bool test_only) {
7285 bool some_diff = false;
7286 if(type->InheritsFormal(TA_class)) {
7287 if(type->HasOption("EDIT_INLINE") || type->HasOption("INLINE")) {
7288 // check the members
7289 some_diff = type->CompareSameType(mds, base_types, trg_bases, src_bases,
7290 GetOff(trg_base), GetOff(src_base),
7291 show_forbidden, show_allowed,
7292 no_ptrs, true); // test only!
7293 if(some_diff && !test_only) { // not already testing, add it
7294 mds.Link(this); base_types.Link(base_typ);
7295 trg_bases.Add(trg_base); src_bases.Add(src_base);
7296 }
7297 }
7298 else {
7299 some_diff = type->CompareSameType(mds, base_types, trg_bases, src_bases,
7300 GetOff(trg_base), GetOff(src_base),
7301 show_forbidden, show_allowed, no_ptrs);
7302 }
7303 }
7304 else {
7305 // actually do the comparison, based on string value
7306 if(type->GetValStr(GetOff(trg_base), trg_base, this) !=
7307 type->GetValStr(GetOff(src_base), src_base, this)) {
7308 if(!test_only) {
7309 mds.Link(this); base_types.Link(base_typ);
7310 trg_bases.Add(trg_base); src_bases.Add(src_base);
7311 }
7312 some_diff = true;
7313 }
7314 }
7315 return some_diff;
7316}
7317
7318bool TypeDef::CompareSameType(Member_List& mds, TypeSpace& base_types,
7319 voidptr_PArray& trg_bases, voidptr_PArray& src_bases,
7320 void* trg_base, void* src_base,
7321 int show_forbidden, int show_allowed, bool no_ptrs,
7322 bool test_only) {
7323 if(InheritsFormal(TA_class)) {
7324 return members.CompareSameType(mds, base_types, trg_bases, src_bases,
7325 this, trg_base, src_base,
7326 show_forbidden, show_allowed, no_ptrs, test_only);
7327 }
7328 else {
7329 taMisc::Error("CompareSameType called on non-class object -- does not work!");
7330 return false;
7331 }
7332}
7333
7334//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7335// PrintType //
7336//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7337
7338static void PrintType_OptsLists(StringtaString& strm, const String_PArray& opts,
7339 const String_PArray& lists)
7340{
7341 if((opts.size > 0) && ((taMisc::type_info_ == taMisc::ALL_INFO) ||
7342 (taMisc::type_info_ == taMisc::NO_LISTS))) {
7343 for(int i=0; i<opts.size; i++)
7344 strm << " #" << opts.FastEl(i);
7345 }
7346 if((lists.size > 0) && ((taMisc::type_info_ == taMisc::ALL_INFO) ||
7347 (taMisc::type_info_ == taMisc::NO_OPTIONS))) {
7348 strm << " LISTS:";
7349 for(int i=0; i<lists.size; i++)
7350 strm << " " << lists.FastEl(i);
7351 }
7352}
7353
7354
7355StringtaString& TypeDef::PrintInherit_impl(StringtaString& strm) const {
7356 for(int i=0; i<parents.size; i++) {
7357 TypeDef* par = parents.FastEl(i);
7358 strm << par->name;
7359 if(par_off[i] > 0)
7360 strm << " +" << par_off[i];
7361 if(par->parents.size > 0)
7362 strm << " : ";
7363 par->PrintInherit_impl(strm);
7364 if(i < parents.size-1)
7365 strm << ", ";
7366 }
7367 return strm;
7368}
7369
7370StringtaString& TypeDef::PrintInherit(StringtaString& strm) const {
7371 for(int i=0; i<par_formal.size; i++) {
7372 strm << par_formal.FastEl(i)->name << " ";
7373 }
7374
7375 strm << name;
7376 if(parents.size > 0)
7377 strm << " : ";
7378 PrintInherit_impl(strm);
7379 return strm;
7380}
7381
7382StringtaString& TypeDef::PrintTokens(StringtaString& strm, int indent) const {
7383 return tokens.Print(strm, indent);
7384}
7385
7386StringtaString& TypeDef::PrintType(StringtaString& strm, int indent) const {
7387 taMisc::IndentString(strm, indent);
7388 PrintInherit(strm);
7389// if(taMisc::type_info_ == taMisc::ALL_INFO)
7390 strm << " (Sz: " << StringtaString(size) << ")";
7391 if(InheritsFormal(TA_class) || InheritsFormal(TA_enum))
7392 strm << " {";
7393 else
7394 strm << ";";
7395 if(!desc.empty()) {
7396 if(InheritsFormal(TA_class)) {
7397 strm << "\n";
7398 taMisc::IndentString(strm, indent) << "//" << desc ;
7399 }
7400 else
7401 strm << "\t//" << desc ;
7402 }
7403
7404 PrintType_OptsLists(strm, opts, lists);
7405 strm << "\n";
7406 if(InheritsFormal(TA_class)) {
7407 if(sub_types.size > 0) {
7408 strm << "\n";
7409 taMisc::IndentString(strm, indent+1) << "// sub-types\n";
7410 int i;
7411 for(i=0; i<sub_types.size; i++) {
7412 if(!(sub_types.FastEl(i)->internal))
7413 sub_types.FastEl(i)->PrintType(strm,indent+1) << "\n";
7414 }
7415 }
7416 members.PrintType(strm, indent+1);
7417 methods.PrintType(strm, indent+1);
7418 taMisc::IndentString(strm, indent) << "} ";
7419 if(children.size > 0) {
7420 strm << " children: ";
7421 int i;
7422 for(i=0; i<children.size; i++) {
7423 strm << children.FastEl(i)->name;
7424 if(i < children.size - 1)
7425 strm << ", ";
7426 }
7427 }
7428 strm << "\n";
7429 }
7430 else if(InheritsFormal(TA_enum)) {
7431 enum_vals.PrintType(strm, indent+1);
7432 taMisc::IndentString(strm, indent) << "}\n";
7433 }
7434 return strm;
7435}
7436
7437StringtaString& EnumSpace::PrintType(StringtaString& strm, int indent) const {
7438 EnumDef* enm;
7439 String_PArray col1;
7440 String_PArray col2;
7441 for(int i=0; i<size; i++) {
7442 enm = FastEl(i);
7443 col1.Add(enm->name);
7444 StringtaString c2;
7445 c2 << "= " << enm->enum_no << ";";
7446 if(!enm->desc.empty())
7447 c2 << "\t//" << enm->desc;
7448 PrintType_OptsLists(c2, enm->opts, enm->lists);
7449 col2.Add(c2);
7450 }
7451 return taMisc::FancyPrintTwoCol(strm, col1, col2, indent);
7452}
7453
7454StringtaString& MemberSpace::PrintType(StringtaString& strm, int indent) const {
7455 taMisc::IndentString(strm, indent) << "// members\n";
7456 String_PArray col1;
7457 String_PArray col2;
7458 for(int i=0; i<size; i++) {
7459 StringtaString c1; StringtaString c2;
7460 FastEl(i)->PrintType(c1, c2);
7461 col1.Add(c1); col2.Add(c2);
7462 }
7463 return taMisc::FancyPrintTwoCol(strm, col1, col2, indent);
7464}
7465
7466StringtaString& MethodSpace::PrintType(StringtaString& strm, int indent) const {
7467 taMisc::IndentString(strm, indent) << "// methods\n";
7468 String_PArray col1;
7469 String_PArray col2;
7470 for(int i=0; i<size; i++) {
7471 StringtaString c1; StringtaString c2;
7472 FastEl(i)->PrintType(c1, c2);
7473 col1.Add(c1); col2.Add(c2);
7474 }
7475 return taMisc::FancyPrintTwoCol(strm, col1, col2, indent);
7476}
7477
7478void MemberDef::PrintType(StringtaString& col1, StringtaString& col2) const {
7479 col1 = "";
7480 if(is_static)
7481 col1 << "static ";
7482 col1 << type->Get_C_Name();
7483 if(fun_ptr)
7484 col2 = StringtaString("(*") + name + ")()";
7485 else
7486 col2 = name + ";";
7487 col2 << " // ";
7488 if(taMisc::type_info_ == taMisc::MEMB_OFFSETS) {
7489 intptr_t ui_off = (intptr_t)GetOff((void*)0x100); // 0x100 is arbitrary non-zero number..
7490 ui_off -= 0x100; // now get rid of offset
7491 if(ui_off > 0) {
7492 col2 << "+" << ui_off;
7493 if(base_off > 0)
7494 col2 << "+" << base_off;
7495 }
7496 if(base_off > 0)
7497 col2 << "+" << base_off;
7498 }
7499 if(!desc.empty())
7500 col2 << " " << desc;
7501 PrintType_OptsLists(col2, opts, lists);
7502}
7503
7504void MethodDef::PrintType(StringtaString& col1, StringtaString& col2) const {
7505 col1 = "";
7506 if(is_static)
7507 col1 << "static ";
7508 col1 << type->Get_C_Name();
7509 col2 = "";
7510 col2 << name << "(";
7511 if(fun_argc > 0) {
7512 for(int i=0; i<fun_argc; i++) {
7513 col2 << arg_types[i]->Get_C_Name() << " " << arg_names[i];
7514 if((fun_argd >= 0) && (i >= fun_argd)) // indicate a default
7515 col2 << "=" << arg_defs[i];
7516 if(i+1 < fun_argc)
7517 col2 << ", ";
7518 }
7519 }
7520 col2 << ");";
7521 if(!desc.empty())
7522 col2 << " // " + desc;
7523 PrintType_OptsLists(col2, opts, lists);
7524}
7525
7526
7527//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7528// Print/R //
7529//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7530
7531StringtaString& MemberSpace::Print(StringtaString& strm, void* base, int indent) const {
7532 String_PArray col1;
7533 String_PArray col2;
7534 for(int i=0; i<size; i++) {
7535 MemberDef* md = FastEl(i);
7536 if(!md->ShowMember()) continue;
7537 StringtaString c1; StringtaString c2;
7538 md->Print(c1, c2, base, indent);
7539 col1.Add(c1); col2.Add(c2);
7540 }
7541 return taMisc::FancyPrintTwoCol(strm, col1, col2, indent);
7542}
7543
7544void MemberDef::Print(StringtaString& col1, StringtaString& col2, void* base, int indent) const {
7545 void* new_base = GetOff(base);
7546 col1 = type->Get_C_Name();
7547 col1 << " ";
7548 if(fun_ptr) {
7549 col1 << StringtaString("(*") + name + ")()" << " = ";
7550 }
7551 else {
7552 col1 << name << " = ";
7553 }
7554 col2 = type->GetValStr(new_base, base, (MemberDef*)this, TypeDef::SC_DEFAULT, true);
7555 // force inline
7556}
7557
7558StringtaString& TypeDef::Print(StringtaString& strm, void* base, int indent) const {
7559 taMisc::IndentString(strm, indent);
7560#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
7561 if(DerivesFrom(TA_taBase)) {
7562 taBase* rbase;
7563 if(ptr == 0)
7564 rbase = (taBase*)base;
7565 else if(ptr == 1)
7566 rbase = *((taBase**)base);
7567 else
7568 rbase = NULL__null;
7569
7570 if(rbase)
7571 strm << rbase->GetPathNames();
7572 else
7573 strm << Get_C_Name();
7574 }
7575 else
7576#endif
7577 strm << Get_C_Name();
7578
7579#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
7580 if(InheritsFrom(TA_taBase)) {
7581 taBase* rbase = (taBase*)base;
7582 strm << " " << rbase->GetName()
7583 << " (refn=" << taBase::GetRefn(rbase) << ")";
7584 }
7585#endif
7586
7587 if(InheritsFormal(TA_class)) {
7588 strm << " {\n";
7589 members.Print(strm, base, indent+1);
7590 taMisc::IndentString(strm, indent) << "}\n";
7591 }
7592 else {
7593 strm << " = " << GetValStr(base) << "\n";
7594 }
7595 return strm;
7596}
7597
7598StringtaString TypeDef::GetHTMLLink(bool gendoc) const {
7599 STRING_BUF(rval, 32)taString rval(0, 32, '\0'); // extends if needed
7600 TypeDef* npt = const_cast<TypeDef*>(this);
7601 if(npt->ptr > 0)
7602 npt = npt->GetNonPtrType();
7603 if(npt && npt->ref)
7604 npt = npt->GetNonRefType();
7605 if(npt && npt->DerivesFrom(TA_const))
7606 npt = npt->GetNonConstType();
7607 if(npt) {
7608 if(npt->InheritsFormal(TA_class)) {
7609 if(gendoc)
7610 rval.cat("<a href=\"").cat(npt->name).cat(".html\">").cat(Get_C_Name()).cat("</a>");
7611 else
7612 rval.cat("<a href=\"ta:.Type.").cat(npt->name).cat("\">").cat(Get_C_Name()).cat("</a>");
7613 }
7614 else if(npt->InheritsFormal(TA_enum)) {
7615 rval.cat("<a href=\"#").cat(npt->name).cat("\">").cat(Get_C_Name()).cat("</a>");
7616 }
7617 else {
7618 rval.cat(Get_C_Name());
7619 }
7620 }
7621 else {
7622 rval.cat(Get_C_Name());
7623 }
7624 return rval;
7625}
7626
7627StringtaString TypeDef::GetHTMLSubType(bool gendoc, bool short_fmt) const {
7628 STRING_BUF(rval, (short_fmt ? 100 : 300))taString rval(0, (short_fmt ? 100 : 300), '\0'); // extends if needed
7629 StringtaString own_typ;
7630 TypeDef* ot = GetOwnerType();
7631 if(ot) {
7632 own_typ.cat(ot->name).cat("::");
7633 }
7634 if(InheritsFormal(TA_class)) {
7635 // todo: not yet supported by maketa..
7636 }
7637 else if(InheritsFormal(TA_enum)) {
7638 if(short_fmt) {
7639 rval.cat("enum <b><a href=\"#").cat(name).cat("\">").cat(own_typ).cat(name).cat("</a></b> { ");
7640 for(int i=0;i<enum_vals.size;i++) {
7641 EnumDef* ed = enum_vals[i];
7642 if(i > 0) rval.cat(", ");
7643 rval.cat(ed->name);
7644 }
7645 rval.cat(" }");
7646 }
7647 else {
7648 rval.cat("<h3 class=\"flags\"><a name=\"").cat(name).cat("\"></a>");
7649 rval.cat("enum ").cat(own_typ).cat(name).cat("</h3>\n");
7650 rval.cat("<p>").cat(trim(desc).xml_esc()).cat("</p>\n");
7651 rval.cat("<p><table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"2\" cellspacing=\"1\" width=\"100%\">\n");
7652 rval.cat("<tr><th width=\"25%\">Constant</th><th width=\"15%\">Value</th><th width=\"60%\">Description</th></tr>\n");
7653 for(int i=0;i<enum_vals.size;i++) {
7654 EnumDef* ed = enum_vals[i];
7655 rval.cat("<tr><td valign=\"top\"><tt>").cat(own_typ).cat(ed->name).cat("</tt></td>");
7656 rval.cat("<td align=\"center\" valign=\"top\"><tt>0x").cat(StringtaString(ed->enum_no,"%08X")).cat("</tt></td>");
7657 rval.cat("<td valign=\"top\">").cat(trim(ed->desc).xml_esc()).cat("</td></tr>\n");
7658 }
7659 rval.cat("</table></p>\n");
7660 }
7661 }
7662 else {
7663 rval.cat("typedef ");
7664 for(int i=0;i<parents.size;i++) {
7665 rval.cat(parents[i]->Get_C_Name()).cat(" ");
7666 }
7667 rval.cat(name);
7668 }
7669 return rval;
7670}
7671
7672StringtaString TypeDef::GetHTML(bool gendoc) const {
7673 if(!InheritsFormal(TA_class)) return GetHTMLLink(gendoc);
7674
7675 STRING_BUF(rval, 9096)taString rval(0, 9096, '\0'); // extends if needed
7676
7677 StringtaString wiki_help_url = taMisc::GetWikiURL(taMisc::web_help_wiki, true); // add index
7678
7679 // preamble
7680 rval.cat("<iframe src=\"").cat(wiki_help_url).cat(name).cat("\" width=\"99%\" height=\"40%\" style=\"border:5px solid #000000\"></iframe>\n");
7681 rval.cat("<head>\n");
7682 // following is magic code viewer incantation
7683 rval.cat("<script>function writesrc(t,signature){t.innerHTML='<iframe width=\"100%\" height=\"50%\" src=\"http://grey.colorado.edu/gendoc.py?q='+signature+'\"></iframe>';}</script>\n");
7684 rval.cat("<title>").cat(taMisc::app_name).cat(" ").cat(taMisc::version).cat(" ").cat(name).cat(" Class Reference</title>\n");
7685 // include style sheet right in the thing
7686 rval.cat("<style type=\"text/css\">\n");
7687 rval.cat("h3.fn,span.fn { margin-left: 1cm; text-indent: -1cm; }\n");
7688 rval.cat("a:link { color: #004faf; text-decoration: none }\n");
7689 rval.cat("a:visited { color: #672967; text-decoration: none }\n");
7690 rval.cat("a.obsolete { color: #661100; text-decoration: none }\n");
7691 rval.cat("a.compat { color: #661100; text-decoration: none }\n");
7692 rval.cat("a.obsolete:visited { color: #995500; text-decoration: none }\n");
7693 rval.cat("a.compat:visited { color: #995500; text-decoration: none }\n");
7694 rval.cat("td.postheader { font-family: sans-serif }\n");
7695 rval.cat("tr.address { font-family: sans-serif }\n");
7696 rval.cat("body { background: #ffffff; color: black }\n");
7697 rval.cat("table tr.odd { background: #f0f0f0; color: black; }\n");
7698 rval.cat("table tr.even { background: #e4e4e4; color: black; }\n");
7699 rval.cat("table.annotated th { padding: 3px; text-align: left }\n");
7700 rval.cat("table.annotated td { padding: 3px; }\n");
7701 rval.cat("table tr pre { padding-top: none; padding-bottom: none; padding-left: none; padding-right: none; border: none; background: none }\n");
7702 rval.cat("tr.qt-style { background: #66B036; color: black }\n");
7703 rval.cat("body pre { padding: 0.2em; border: #e7e7e7 1px solid; background: #f1f1f1; color: black }\n");
7704 rval.cat("span.preprocessor, span.preprocessor a { color: darkblue; }\n");
7705 rval.cat("span.comment { color: darkred; font-style: italic }\n");
7706 rval.cat("span.string,span.char { color: darkgreen; }\n");
7707 rval.cat("span.fakelink{text-decoration:underline;color:blue;cursor:pointer;font-size:small;}\n");
7708 rval.cat(".title { text-align: center }\n");
7709 rval.cat(".subtitle { font-size: 0.8em }\n");
7710 rval.cat(".small-subtitle { font-size: 0.65em }\n");
7711 rval.cat("</style>\n");
7712 // rval.cat("<link href=\"classic.css\" rel=\"stylesheet\" type=\"text/css\" />\n");
7713 rval.cat("</head>\n");
7714 rval.cat("<body>\n");
7715 rval.cat("<table border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" width=\"100%\">\n");
7716 rval.cat("<tr>\n");
7717 rval.cat("<td align=\"left\" valign=\"top\" width=\"32\"><a href=\"").cat(taMisc::web_home).cat("\">");
7718 rval.cat(taMisc::app_name).cat("</a> ").cat(taMisc::version).cat("</td>\n");
7719 rval.cat("<td width=\"1\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</td><td class=\"postheader\" valign=\"center\">");
7720 rval.cat("<a href=\"").cat(taMisc::web_home).cat("\"><font color=\"#004faf\">Home</font></a>&nbsp;&middot; ");
7721 rval.cat("<a href=\"").cat(wiki_help_url).cat(name).cat("\"><font color=\"#004faf\">Wiki Docs For: ").cat(name).cat("</font></a>&nbsp;&middot; ");
7722 rval.cat("<a href=\"ta:.Type.").cat(name).cat("\"><font color=\"#004faf\">Emergent&nbsp;Help&nbsp;Browser</font></a>&nbsp;\n");
7723
7724 rval.cat("<td align=\"right\" valign=\"top\" width=\"230\"></td></tr></table><h1 class=\"title\">");
7725 rval.cat(name).cat(" Class Reference<br />\n");
7726 // <span class=\"small-subtitle\">[<a href="qtgui.html">QtGui</a> module]</span>
7727 rval.cat("</h1>\n\n");
7728
7729 rval.cat("<p>").cat(trim(desc).xml_esc()).cat("</p>\n");
7730 rval.cat("<p>See for more info: <a href=\"").cat(wiki_help_url).cat(name).cat("\">Wiki Docs For: ").cat(name).cat("</a></p>\n\n");
7731
7732 // NOTE: for include file tracking -- not a bad idea to actually record this info in maketa!!
7733 // rval.cat("<pre> #include &lt;QTextDocument&gt;</pre>\n");
7734
7735 if(par_cache.size > 0) {
7736 int inhi = 0;
7737 rval.cat("<p>Inherits From: ");
7738 for(int i=0;i<par_cache.size; i++) {
7739 TypeDef* par = par_cache[i];
7740 if(par->InheritsFormal(TA_templ_inst)) continue; // none of those
7741 if(inhi > 0) rval.cat(", ");
7742 rval.cat(par->GetHTMLLink(gendoc));
7743 inhi++;
7744 }
7745 rval.cat("</p>\n\n");
7746 }
7747
7748 if(children.size > 0) {
7749 int inhi = 0;
7750 rval.cat("<p>Inherited By: ");
7751 for(int i=0;i<children.size; i++) {
7752 TypeDef* par = children[i];
7753 if(par->InheritsFormal(TA_templ_inst)) continue; // none of those
7754 if(inhi > 0) rval.cat(", ");
7755 rval.cat(par->GetHTMLLink(gendoc));
7756 inhi++;
7757 }
7758 rval.cat("</p>\n\n");
7759 }
7760
7761 if(taMisc::help_detail >= taMisc::HD_DETAILS) {
7762 rval.cat("<p> Size: ").cat(StringtaString(this->size)).cat("</p>\n");
7763 if(opts.size > 0) {
7764 rval.cat("<p>").cat(GetOptsHTML()).cat("</p>\n");
7765 }
7766 }
7767
7768 rval.cat("<p>Index: <a href=\"#subtypes\">SubTypes</a>, ");
7769
7770 rval.cat("<a href=\"#members\">Members</a>, ");
7771 rval.cat("<a href=\"#methods\">Methods</a>, ");
7772 rval.cat("<a href=\"#expert_members\">Expert Members</a>, ");
7773 rval.cat("<a href=\"#expert_methods\">Expert Methods</a></p>");
7774
7775 rval.cat("<a name=\"subtypes\"></a>\n");
7776 rval.cat("<h3>Sub Types</h3>\n");
7777 if(sub_types.size > 0) {
7778 rval.cat("<ul>\n");
7779 for(int i=0;i<sub_types.size;i++) {
7780 TypeDef* st = sub_types[i];
7781 if(!st->InheritsFormal(&TA_enum)) continue;
7782 if((this != &TA_taBase) && (st->GetOwnerType() == &TA_taBase)) continue;
7783 if(st->GetOwnerType()->InheritsFormal(TA_templ_inst)) continue;
7784 rval.cat("<li>").cat(st->GetHTMLSubType(gendoc, true)).cat("</li>\n"); // true=short fmt
7785 }
7786 rval.cat("</ul>\n");
7787 }
7788
7789 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7790 // now for full detail render
7791
7792 if(sub_types.size > 0) {
7793 rval.cat("<hr />\n");
7794 rval.cat("<h2>SubType Documentation</h2>\n");
7795
7796 for(int i=0;i<sub_types.size;i++) {
7797 TypeDef* st = sub_types[i];
7798 if(!st->InheritsFormal(&TA_enum)) continue;
7799 if((this != &TA_taBase) && (st->GetOwnerType() == &TA_taBase)) continue;
7800 if(st->GetOwnerType()->InheritsFormal(TA_templ_inst)) continue;
7801 rval.cat(st->GetHTMLSubType(gendoc, false));
7802 }
7803 }
7804
7805 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7806 // REGULAR members and methods
7807 {
7808 rval.cat("<hr />\n");
7809 rval.cat("<h2>Regular (preferred) Member and Method Documentation</h2>\n");
7810
7811 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7812 // collect the members and methods into string arrays for sorting
7813 String_PArray memb_idx;
7814 for(int i=0;i<members.size;i++) {
7815 MemberDef* md = members[i];
7816 if(md->HasOption("NO_SHOW") || md->HasOption("HIDDEN") || md->HasOption("EXPERT"))
7817 continue;
7818 if((this != &TA_taBase) && (md->GetOwnerType() == &TA_taBase)) continue;
7819 StringtaString cat = md->GetCat();
7820 if(cat.empty()) cat = "_NoCategory";
7821 StringtaString key = cat + ":" + md->name;
7822 memb_idx.Add(key);
7823 }
7824 memb_idx.Sort(); // sorts by category then key, in effect
7825
7826 String_PArray meth_idx;
7827 for(int i=0;i<methods.size;i++) {
7828 MethodDef* md = methods[i];
7829 if(md->HasOption("EXPERT")) continue;
7830 if((this != &TA_taBase) && (md->GetOwnerType() == &TA_taBase)) continue;
7831 StringtaString cat = md->GetCat();
7832 if(cat.empty()) cat = "_NoCategory";
7833 StringtaString key = cat + ":" + md->name;
7834 meth_idx.Add(key);
7835 }
7836 meth_idx.Sort(); // sorts by category then key, in effect
7837
7838 rval.cat(GetHTMLMembMeth(memb_idx, meth_idx, "", "", gendoc));
7839 }
7840
7841 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7842 // EXPERT members and methods
7843 {
7844 rval.cat("<hr />\n");
7845 rval.cat("<h2>Expert Member and Method Documentation</h2>\n");
7846
7847 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7848 // collect the members and methods into string arrays for sorting
7849 String_PArray memb_idx;
7850 for(int i=0;i<members.size;i++) {
7851 MemberDef* md = members[i];
7852 if(!(md->HasOption("NO_SHOW") || md->HasOption("HIDDEN") || md->HasOption("EXPERT")))
7853 continue;
7854 if((this != &TA_taBase) && (md->GetOwnerType() == &TA_taBase)) continue;
7855 StringtaString cat = md->GetCat();
7856 if(cat.empty()) cat = "_NoCategory";
7857 StringtaString key = cat + ":" + md->name;
7858 memb_idx.Add(key);
7859 }
7860 memb_idx.Sort(); // sorts by category then key, in effect
7861
7862 String_PArray meth_idx;
7863 for(int i=0;i<methods.size;i++) {
7864 MethodDef* md = methods[i];
7865 if(!md->HasOption("EXPERT")) continue;
7866 if((this != &TA_taBase) && (md->GetOwnerType() == &TA_taBase)) continue;
7867 StringtaString cat = md->GetCat();
7868 if(cat.empty()) cat = "_NoCategory";
7869 StringtaString key = cat + ":" + md->name;
7870 meth_idx.Add(key);
7871 }
7872 meth_idx.Sort(); // sorts by category then key, in effect
7873
7874 rval.cat(GetHTMLMembMeth(memb_idx, meth_idx, "Expert ", "expert_", gendoc));
7875 }
7876
7877 /////////////////////////
7878 // postscript/footer
7879 rval.cat("<p /><address><hr /><div align=\"center\">\n");
7880 rval.cat("<table width=\"100%\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\"><tr class=\"address\">\n");
7881 rval.cat("<td width=\"70%\" align=\"left\">Copyright &copy; 2011 Regents of the University of Colorado, Carnegie Mellon University, Princeton University.</td>\n");
7882 // rval.cat("<td width=\"40%\" align=\"center\"><a href=\"trademarks.html\">Trademarks</a></td>\n");
7883 rval.cat("<td width=\"30%\" align=\"right\"><div align=\"right\"> ").cat(taMisc::app_name).cat(" ").cat(taMisc::version).cat("</div></td>\n");
7884 rval.cat("</tr></table></div></address></body>\n");
7885 rval.cat("</html>\n");
7886 return rval;
7887}
7888
7889
7890StringtaString TypeDef::GetHTMLMembMeth(String_PArray& memb_idx, String_PArray& meth_idx,
7891 const StringtaString& label_prefix, const StringtaString& link_prefix, bool gendoc) const {
7892
7893 StringtaString rval;
7894
7895 //////////////////////////////////////////
7896 // first pass output
7897
7898 rval.cat("<a name=\"" + link_prefix + "members\"></a>\n");
7899 rval.cat("<h3>" + label_prefix + "Members</h3>\n");
7900 if(memb_idx.size > 0) {
7901 StringtaString prv_cat;
7902 for(int i=0;i<memb_idx.size;i++) {
7903 StringtaString key = memb_idx[i];
7904 StringtaString cat = key.before(':');
7905 StringtaString mnm = key.after(':');
7906 MemberDef* md = members.FindName(mnm);
7907 if(cat != prv_cat) {
7908 if(prv_cat.nonempty()) rval.cat("</ul>\n"); // terminate prev
7909 rval.cat("<h4>" + label_prefix + "Member Category: <a href=\"#MbrCat-").cat(cat).cat("\">").cat(cat).cat("</a></h4>\n");
7910 rval.cat("<ul>\n");
7911 prv_cat = cat;
7912 }
7913 rval.cat("<li>").cat(md->GetHTML(gendoc, true)).cat("</li>\n"); // true = short_fmt
7914 }
7915 rval.cat("</ul>\n");
7916 }
7917
7918 rval.cat("<a name=\"" + link_prefix + "methods\"></a>\n");
7919 rval.cat("<h3>" + label_prefix + "Methods</h3>\n");
7920 if(meth_idx.size > 0) {
7921 StringtaString prv_cat;
7922 for(int i=0;i<meth_idx.size;i++) {
7923 StringtaString key = meth_idx[i];
7924 StringtaString cat = key.before(':');
7925 StringtaString mnm = key.after(':');
7926 MethodDef* md = methods.FindName(mnm);
7927 if(cat != prv_cat) {
7928 if(prv_cat.nonempty()) rval.cat("</ul>\n"); // terminate prev
7929 rval.cat("<h4>" + label_prefix + "Method Category: <a href=\"#MthCat-").cat(cat).cat("\">").cat(cat).cat("</a></h4>\n");
7930 rval.cat("<ul>\n");
7931 prv_cat = cat;
7932 }
7933 rval.cat("<li>").cat(md->GetHTML(gendoc, true)).cat("</li>\n"); // true = short_fmt
7934 }
7935 rval.cat("</ul>\n");
7936 }
7937
7938 if(memb_idx.size > 0) {
7939 rval.cat("<hr />\n");
7940 rval.cat("<h2>Member Documentation</h2>\n");
7941
7942 StringtaString prv_cat;
7943 for(int i=0;i<memb_idx.size;i++) {
7944 StringtaString key = memb_idx[i];
7945 StringtaString cat = key.before(':');
7946 StringtaString mnm = key.after(':');
7947 MemberDef* md = members.FindName(mnm);
7948 if(cat != prv_cat) {
7949 rval.cat("<a name=\"MbrCat-").cat(cat).cat("\"></a>\n");
7950 rval.cat("<h3>Member Category: ").cat(cat).cat("</h3>\n");
7951 prv_cat = cat;
7952 }
7953 rval.cat(md->GetHTML(gendoc, false)).cat("\n"); // extra cr for good readability
7954 }
7955 }
7956
7957 if(methods.size > 0) {
7958 rval.cat("<hr />\n");
7959 rval.cat("<h2>Method Documentation</h2>\n");
7960
7961 StringtaString prv_cat;
7962 for(int i=0;i<meth_idx.size;i++) {
7963 StringtaString key = meth_idx[i];
7964 StringtaString cat = key.before(':');
7965 StringtaString mnm = key.after(':');
7966 MethodDef* md = methods.FindName(mnm);
7967 if(cat != prv_cat) {
7968 rval.cat("<a name=\"MthCat-").cat(cat).cat("\"></a>\n");
7969 rval.cat("<h3>Method Category: ").cat(cat).cat("</h3>\n");
7970 prv_cat = cat;
7971 }
7972 rval.cat(md->GetHTML(gendoc, false)).cat("\n"); // extra cr for good readability
7973 }
7974 }
7975 return rval;
7976}
7977
7978void TypeDef::GetObjDiffVal(taObjDiff_List& odl, int nest_lev, const void* base,
7979 MemberDef* memb_def, const void* par,
7980 TypeDef* par_typ, taObjDiffRec* par_od) const {
7981#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
7982 if(InheritsFrom(TA_taBase)) {
7983 taBase* rbase = (taBase*)base;
7984 if(rbase) {
7985 rbase->GetObjDiffVal(odl, nest_lev, memb_def, par, par_typ, par_od);
7986 }
7987 return;
7988 }
7989#endif
7990 // always just add a record for this guy
7991 taObjDiffRec* odr = new taObjDiffRec(odl, nest_lev, const_cast<TypeDef*>(this), memb_def, (void*)base,
7992 (void*)par, par_typ, par_od);
7993 odl.Add(odr);
7994// if(ptr > 0) {
7995// // this will be set wrong here.. need some complex logic probaly to fix it..
7996// }
7997
7998 // then check for classes
7999 if(ptr == 0 && InheritsNonAtomicClass()) {
8000 GetObjDiffVal_class(odl, nest_lev, base, memb_def, par, par_typ, odr);
8001 }
8002}
8003
8004void TypeDef::GetObjDiffVal_class(taObjDiff_List& odl, int nest_lev, const void* base,
8005 MemberDef* memb_def, const void* par, TypeDef* par_typ,
8006 taObjDiffRec* par_od) const {
8007 MemberDef* last_md = NULL__null;
8008 for(int i=0; i<members.size; i++) {
8009 MemberDef* md = members.FastEl(i);
8010 if(md->HasOption("NO_SAVE") || md->HasOption("READ_ONLY") || md->HasOption("GUI_READ_ONLY")
8011 || md->HasOption("HIDDEN"))
8012 continue;
8013 if(par_od && par_od->mdef) {
8014 // object is a member
8015 if(md->HasOption("HIDDEN_INLINE")) continue;
8016 }
8017 if(md->HasOption("DIFF_LAST")) {
8018 last_md = md;
8019 continue;
8020 }
8021 // handle this in display -- doing it here causes imbalances in diffs that are bad!
8022 // if(!md->GetCondOptTest("CONDSHOW", this, base))
8023 // continue;
8024 if(md->name == "user_data_") {
8025 continue; // too much clutter for now..
8026 }
8027 md->type->GetObjDiffVal(odl, nest_lev+1, md->GetOff(base), md, base, const_cast<TypeDef*>(this), par_od);
8028 }
8029 if(last_md) {
8030 last_md->type->GetObjDiffVal(odl, nest_lev+1, last_md->GetOff(base), last_md, base,
8031 const_cast<TypeDef*>(this), par_od);
8032 }
8033}
8034
8035#ifdef NO_TA_BASE
8036

8131
8132//////////////////////////////////
8133// taObjDiffRec //
8134//////////////////////////////////
8135
8136void taObjDiffRec::Initialize() {
8137 flags = DF_NONE;
8138 owner = NULL__null;
8139 idx = -1;
8140 nest_level = 0;
8141 n_diffs = 0;
8142 diff_no = -1;
8143 diff_no_start = -1;
8144 diff_no_end = -1;
8145 hash_code = 0;
8146 type = NULL__null;
8147 mdef = NULL__null;
8148 addr = NULL__null;
8149 par_addr = NULL__null;
8150 par_type = NULL__null;
8151 par_odr = NULL__null;
8152 diff_odr = NULL__null;
8153 tabref = NULL__null;
8154 widget = NULL__null;
8155}
8156
8157void taObjDiffRec::Copy_(const taObjDiffRec& cp) {
8158 flags = cp.flags;
8159 nest_level = cp.nest_level;
8160 n_diffs = cp.n_diffs;
8161 diff_no = cp.diff_no;
8162 diff_no_start = cp.diff_no_start;
8163 diff_no_end = cp.diff_no_end;
8164 name = cp.name;
8165 value = cp.value;
8166 hash_code = cp.hash_code;
8167 type = cp.type;
8168 mdef = cp.mdef;
8169 addr = cp.addr;
8170 par_addr = cp.par_addr;
8171 par_type = cp.par_type;
8172 par_odr = cp.par_odr;
8173 diff_odr = cp.diff_odr;
8174#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8175 if(cp.tabref) {
8176 if(!tabref) tabref = new taBaseRef;
8177 ((taBaseRef*)tabref)->set(((taBaseRef*)cp.tabref)->ptr());
8178 }
8179 else {
8180 if(tabref) {
8181 delete (taBaseRef*)tabref;
8182 tabref = NULL__null;
8183 }
8184 }
8185#endif
8186}
8187
8188taObjDiffRec::taObjDiffRec() {
8189 Initialize();
8190}
8191
8192taObjDiffRec::taObjDiffRec(const taObjDiffRec& cp) {
8193 Initialize();
8194 Copy_(cp);
8195}
8196
8197taObjDiffRec::taObjDiffRec(taObjDiff_List& odl, int nest, TypeDef* td, MemberDef* md, void* adr,
8198 void* par_adr, TypeDef* par_typ, taObjDiffRec* par_od) {
8199 Initialize();
8200 nest_level = nest;
8201 type = td;
8202 mdef = md;
8203 addr = adr;
8204 par_addr = par_adr;
8205 par_type = par_typ;
8206 par_odr = par_od;
8207 GetValue(odl);
8208}
8209
8210taObjDiffRec::~taObjDiffRec() {
8211#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8212 if(tabref)
8213 delete (taBaseRef*)tabref;
8214 tabref = NULL__null;
8215#endif
8216}
8217
8218void taObjDiffRec::Copy(const taObjDiffRec& cp) {
8219 Copy_(cp);
8220}
8221
8222void taObjDiffRec::GetValue(taObjDiff_List& odl) {
8223 if(!type || !addr) return; // not set!
8224 value = type->GetValStr(addr, par_addr, mdef, TypeDef::SC_VALUE);
8225 if(mdef) {
8226 name = mdef->name;
8227 }
8228 else {
8229 name = type->name;
8230 }
8231#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8232 if(type->InheritsFrom(&TA_taBase)) {
8233 if(!mdef && nest_level > 0)
8234 value = type->name + ": " + ((taBase*)addr)->GetDisplayName();
8235 else
8236 value = type->name; // this is the relevant info at this level for diffing
8237 }
8238 else if(((type->ptr == 1) && type->DerivesFrom(&TA_taBase)) ||
8239 type->InheritsFrom(TA_taSmartRef) ||
8240 type->InheritsFrom(TA_taSmartPtr)) {
8241 taBase* rbase = NULL__null;
8242 if((type->ptr == 1) && type->DerivesFrom(&TA_taBase)) rbase = *((taBase**)addr);
8243 else if(type->InheritsFrom(TA_taSmartRef)) rbase = ((taSmartRef*)addr)->ptr();
8244 else if(type->InheritsFrom(TA_taSmartPtr)) rbase = ((taSmartPtr*)addr)->ptr();
8245 if(rbase && (rbase->GetOwner() || (rbase == tabMisc::root))) {
8246 if(rbase->IsChildOf(odl.tab_obj_a)) {
8247 value = rbase->GetPathNames(NULL__null, odl.tab_obj_a); // scope by tab obj
8248 SetDiffFlag(VAL_PATH_REL);
8249 }
8250 else {
8251 // otherwise, always do it relative to project
8252 value = rbase->GetPathNames(NULL__null, rbase->GetOwner(&TA_taProject));
8253 }
8254 }
8255 }
8256#endif
8257 ComputeHashCode();
8258}
8259
8260void taObjDiffRec::ComputeHashCode() {
8261 // note: level is critical -- don't want to compare at diff levels
8262 hash_code = taPtrList_impl::HashCode_String(name + "&" + value) + nest_level;
8263}
8264
8265StringtaString taObjDiffRec::GetDisplayName() {
8266#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8267 if(!mdef && addr && type->InheritsFrom(&TA_taBase)) {
8268 return name + ": " + ((taBase*)addr)->GetDisplayName();
8269 }
8270#endif
8271 return name;
8272}
8273
8274bool taObjDiffRec::ActionAllowed() {
8275 if(HasDiffFlag(DIFF_ADDEL)) {
8276 if(HasDiffFlag(SUB_NO_ACT)) return false;
8277 if(!type->InheritsFrom(&TA_taBase)) return false;
8278 }
8279 else if(HasDiffFlag(DIFF_PAR)) {
8280 return false;
8281 }
8282 return true;
8283}
8284
8285bool taObjDiffRec::GetCurAction(int a_or_b, StringtaString& lbl) {
8286 bool rval = false;
8287 lbl = _nilStringtaString();
8288 if(HasDiffFlag(DIFF_DEL)) {
8289 if(a_or_b == 0) { // "a" guy
8290 rval = HasDiffFlag(ACT_DEL_A);
8291 lbl = "Del A";
8292 } else {
8293 rval = HasDiffFlag(ACT_ADD_A);
8294 lbl = "Add A";
8295 }
8296 }
8297 else if(HasDiffFlag(DIFF_ADD)) {
8298 if(a_or_b == 0) { // "a" guy
8299 rval = HasDiffFlag(ACT_ADD_B);
8300 lbl = "Add B";
8301 } else {
8302 rval = HasDiffFlag(ACT_DEL_B);
8303 lbl = "Del B";
8304 }
8305 }
8306 else if(HasDiffFlag(DIFF_CHG)) {
8307 if(a_or_b == 0) { // "a" guy
8308 rval = HasDiffFlag(ACT_COPY_BA);
8309 lbl = "Cpy B";
8310 } else {
8311 rval = HasDiffFlag(ACT_COPY_AB);
8312 lbl = "Cpy A";
8313 }
8314 }
8315 return rval;
8316}
8317
8318void taObjDiffRec::SetCurAction(int a_or_b, bool on_off) {
8319 if(HasDiffFlag(DIFF_DEL)) {
8320 if(a_or_b == 0) { // "a" guy
8321 SetDiffFlagState(ACT_DEL_A, on_off);
8322 } else {
8323 SetDiffFlagState(ACT_ADD_A, on_off);
8324 }
8325 }
8326 else if(HasDiffFlag(DIFF_ADD)) {
8327 if(a_or_b == 0) { // "a" guy
8328 SetDiffFlagState(ACT_ADD_B, on_off);
8329 } else {
8330 SetDiffFlagState(ACT_DEL_B, on_off);
8331 }
8332 }
8333 else if(HasDiffFlag(DIFF_CHG)) {
8334 if(a_or_b == 0) { // "a" guy
8335 SetDiffFlagState(ACT_COPY_BA, on_off);
8336 } else {
8337 SetDiffFlagState(ACT_COPY_AB, on_off);
8338 }
8339 }
8340}
8341
8342#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8343taObjDiffRec* taObjDiffRec::GetOwnTaBaseRec() {
8344 if(tabref && ((taBaseRef*)tabref)->ptr())
8345 return this;
8346 taObjDiffRec* todr = par_odr;
8347 while(todr && (!todr->tabref || !((taBaseRef*)todr->tabref)->ptr()))
8348 todr = todr->par_odr;
8349 return todr;
8350}
8351
8352taBase* taObjDiffRec::GetOwnTaBase() {
8353 taObjDiffRec* todr = GetOwnTaBaseRec();
8354 if(todr && todr->tabref)
8355 return ((taBaseRef*)todr->tabref)->ptr();
8356 return NULL__null;
8357}
8358
8359StringtaString taObjDiffRec::GetTypeDecoKey() {
8360 taBase* tab = GetOwnTaBase();
8361 if(tab)
8362 return tab->GetTypeDecoKey();
8363 return _nilStringtaString();
8364}
8365#endif
8366
8367
8368//////////////////////////////////
8369// taObjDiff_List //
8370//////////////////////////////////
8371
8372
8373void taObjDiff_List::Initialize() {
8374#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8375 tab_obj_a = NULL__null;
8376 tab_obj_b = NULL__null;
8377#endif
8378 src_a = NULL__null;
8379 src_b = NULL__null;
8380}
8381
8382taObjDiff_List::~taObjDiff_List() {
8383 Reset();
8384#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8385 tab_obj_a = NULL__null;
8386 tab_obj_b = NULL__null;
8387#endif
8388 if(src_a) {
8389 delete src_a;
8390 src_a = NULL__null;
8391 }
8392 if(src_b) {
8393 delete src_b;
8394 src_b = NULL__null;
8395 }
8396}
8397
8398StringtaString taObjDiff_List::El_GetName_(void* it) const { return ((taObjDiffRec*)it)->name; }
8399TALPtr taObjDiff_List::El_GetOwnerList_(void* it) const { return ((taObjDiffRec*)it)->owner; }
8400void* taObjDiff_List::El_SetOwner_(void* it_) {
8401 if (!it_) return it_;
8402 taObjDiffRec* it = (taObjDiffRec*)it_;
8403 it->owner = this;
8404 return it_;
8405
8406}
8407void taObjDiff_List::El_SetIndex_(void* it, int i){ ((taObjDiffRec*)it)->idx = i; }
8408
8409void* taObjDiff_List::El_Ref_(void* it) { taRefN::Ref((taObjDiffRec*)it); return it; }
8410void* taObjDiff_List::El_unRef_(void* it) { taRefN::unRef((taObjDiffRec*)it); return it; }
8411void taObjDiff_List::El_Done_(void* it) { taRefN::Done((taObjDiffRec*)it); }
8412void* taObjDiff_List::El_MakeToken_(void* it) { return (void*)((taObjDiffRec*)it)->MakeToken(); }
8413void* taObjDiff_List::El_Copy_(void* trg, void* src)
8414{ ((taObjDiffRec*)trg)->Copy(*((taObjDiffRec*)src)); return trg; }
8415
8416void taObjDiff_List::HashToIntArray(int_PArray& array) {
8417 for(int i=0; i<size; i++) {
8418 taObjDiffRec* rec = FastEl(i);
8419 array.Add(rec->hash_code);
8420 }
8421}
8422
8423void taObjDiff_List::SetAllFlag(int flg) {
8424 for(int i=0; i<size; i++) {
8425 taObjDiffRec* rec = FastEl(i);
8426 rec->SetDiffFlag((taObjDiffRec::DiffFlags)flg);
8427 }
8428}
8429
8430bool taObjDiff_List::DiffFlagParents(taObjDiffRec* rec) {
8431 if(rec->nest_level == 0) return false;
8432
8433 voidptr_PArray* nestpars;
8434 if(rec->HasDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SRC_A))
8435 nestpars = &nest_a_pars;
8436 else
8437 nestpars = &nest_b_pars;
8438
8439 int rec_nest = rec->nest_level;
8440 nestpars->SetSize(rec_nest+1);
8441
8442 int par_nest = rec_nest;
8443 taObjDiffRec* par_rec = rec;
8444 while(par_rec->par_odr != (taObjDiffRec*)nestpars->FastEl(par_nest-1)) {
8445 nestpars->FastEl(par_nest-1) = (void*)par_rec->par_odr;
8446 par_rec = par_rec->par_odr;
8447 par_nest = par_rec->nest_level;
8448 if(par_nest == 0) break;
8449 }
8450
8451 bool rval = false;
8452 for(int i=0;i<rec_nest;i++) {
8453 par_rec = (taObjDiffRec*)nestpars->FastEl(i);
8454 if(par_rec != rec) {
8455 par_rec->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::DIFF_PAR);
8456 par_rec->n_diffs++;
8457 if(par_rec->diff_no_start < 0)
8458 par_rec->diff_no_start = rec->diff_no;
8459 else
8460 par_rec->diff_no_start = MIN(rec->diff_no, par_rec->diff_no_start)(((rec->diff_no) < (par_rec->diff_no_start)) ? (rec->
diff_no) : (par_rec->diff_no_start));
8461 par_rec->diff_no_end = MAX(rec->diff_no, par_rec->diff_no_end)(((rec->diff_no) > (par_rec->diff_no_end)) ? (rec->
diff_no) : (par_rec->diff_no_end));
8462 rval = true; // got one..
8463 }
8464 }
8465
8466 nestpars->FastEl(rec_nest) = (void*)rec; // always add current as potential next parent
8467 return rval;
8468}
8469
8470void taObjDiff_List::CreateSrcs() {
8471 Reset(); // reset me for good measure too, just to free up any remaining junk
8472 if(src_a) {
8473 src_a->Reset();
8474 }
8475 else {
8476 src_a = new taObjDiff_List;
8477 }
8478 if(src_b) {
8479 src_b->Reset();
8480 }
8481 else {
8482 src_b = new taObjDiff_List;
8483 }
8484}
8485
8486void taObjDiff_List::Diff() {
8487 if(!src_a || !src_b) {
8488 taMisc::Error("taObjDiff_List::Diff() -- source lists not created yet -- programmer error");
8489 return;
8490 }
8491
8492 taStringDiff diff;
8493
8494 Reset(); // clear out my list of diffs
8495 src_a->HashToIntArray(diff.data_a.data);
8496 src_b->HashToIntArray(diff.data_b.data);
8497
8498 src_a->SetAllFlag(taObjDiffRec::SRC_A);
8499 src_b->SetAllFlag(taObjDiffRec::SRC_B);
8500
8501 diff.Diff_impl("", ""); // null strings, use int hash's
8502
8503 nest_a_pars.Reset();
8504 nest_b_pars.Reset();
8505 for(int i=0;i<diff.diffs.size;i++) {
8506 taStringDiffItem& df = diff.diffs[i];
8507
8508 if(df.delete_a == df.insert_b) {
8509 for(int l=0; l<df.delete_a; l++) {
8510 taObjDiffRec* rec_a = src_a->SafeEl(df.start_a + l);
8511 rec_a->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::DIFF_CHG);
8512 rec_a->diff_no = i;
8513 DiffFlagParents(rec_a);
8514 Link(rec_a); // link all the actual diff items to main list
8515 taObjDiffRec* rec_b = src_b->SafeEl(df.start_b + l);
8516 rec_b->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::DIFF_CHG);
8517 rec_b->diff_no = i;
8518 DiffFlagParents(rec_b);
8519 rec_a->diff_odr = rec_b; // this is the paired guy
8520 rec_b->diff_odr = rec_a; // bidir pairing: why not..
8521#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8522 if(rec_a->type->InheritsFrom(&TA_taBase)) { // must have owner to do diff actd
8523 if(!((taBase*)rec_a->addr)->GetOwner())
8524 rec_a->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SUB_NO_ACT);
8525 }
8526 if(rec_b->type->InheritsFrom(&TA_taBase)) { // must have owner to do diff actd
8527 if(!((taBase*)rec_b->addr)->GetOwner())
8528 rec_b->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SUB_NO_ACT);
8529 }
8530#endif
8531 }
8532 }
8533 else {
8534 if(df.delete_a > 0) {
8535 taObjDiffRec* rec_b = src_b->SafeEl(df.start_b);
8536 if(!rec_b) {
8537 rec_b = src_b->Peek();
8538 }
8539 // find a ta_base!
8540#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8541 rec_b = rec_b->GetOwnTaBaseRec();
8542#endif
8543 rec_b->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::DIFF_DEL);
8544 rec_b->diff_no = i;
8545 DiffFlagParents(rec_b);
8546
8547 taObjDiffRec* rec0 = src_a->SafeEl(df.start_a);
8548 int del_nest = rec0->nest_level;
8549 for(int l=0; l<df.delete_a; l++) {
8550 taObjDiffRec* rec_a = src_a->SafeEl(df.start_a + l);
8551 rec_a->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::DIFF_DEL);
8552 rec_a->diff_no = i;
8553 if(DiffFlagParents(rec_a)) // reset nest level if parents needed to be added
8554 del_nest = rec_a->nest_level;
8555 Link(rec_a);
8556 rec_a->diff_odr = rec_b; // starting point in b..
8557 if(rec_a->mdef) { // never actionable
8558 rec_a->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SUB_NO_ACT);
8559 }
8560 else {
8561 if(rec_a->nest_level > del_nest) {
8562 rec_a->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SUB_NO_ACT);
8563 }
8564#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8565 if(rec_a->type->InheritsFrom(&TA_taBase)) { // must have owner to do diff actd
8566 if(!((taBase*)rec_a->addr)->GetOwner())
8567 rec_a->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SUB_NO_ACT);
8568 }
8569 else {
8570 // and cannot be a non-ta-base for add/del
8571 rec_a->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SUB_NO_ACT);
8572 }
8573#endif
8574 }
8575 }
8576 }
8577 if(df.insert_b > 0) {
8578 taObjDiffRec* rec_a = src_a->SafeEl(df.start_a);
8579 if(!rec_a) {
8580 rec_a = src_a->Peek();
8581 }
8582#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8583 rec_a = rec_a->GetOwnTaBaseRec();
8584#endif
8585 rec_a->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::DIFF_ADD);
8586 rec_a->diff_no = i;
8587 DiffFlagParents(rec_a);
8588
8589 taObjDiffRec* rec0 = src_b->SafeEl(df.start_b);
8590 int add_nest = rec0->nest_level;
8591 for(int l=0; l<df.insert_b; l++) {
8592 taObjDiffRec* rec_b = src_b->SafeEl(df.start_b + l);
8593 rec_b->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::DIFF_ADD);
8594 rec_b->diff_no = i;
8595 if(DiffFlagParents(rec_b))
8596 add_nest = rec_b->nest_level;
8597 Link(rec_b);
8598 rec_b->diff_odr = rec_a; // starting point in a..
8599 if(rec_b->mdef) { // never actionable
8600 rec_b->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SUB_NO_ACT);
8601 }
8602 else {
8603 if(rec_b->nest_level > add_nest) {
8604 rec_b->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SUB_NO_ACT);
8605 }
8606#ifndef NO_TA_BASE
8607 if(rec_b->type->InheritsFrom(&TA_taBase)) { // must have owner to do diff actd
8608 if(!((taBase*)rec_b->addr)->GetOwner())
8609 rec_b->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SUB_NO_ACT);
8610 }
8611 else {
8612 // and cannot be a non-ta-base for add/del
8613 rec_b->SetDiffFlag(taObjDiffRec::SUB_NO_ACT);
8614 }
8615#endif
8616 }
8617 }
8618 }
8619 }
8620 }
8621
8622 // String strm;
8623 // Print(strm);
8624 // taMisc::Info(strm);
8625
8626 // this is not good: much better to just elide in display
8627 // DiffPurgeNoDiffs(src_a);
8628 // DiffPurgeNoDiffs(src_b);
8629
8630 nest_a_pars.Reset();
8631 nest_b_pars.Reset();
8632}
8633
8634int taObjDiff_List::DiffPurgeNoDiffs(taObjDiff_List* src) {
8635 int n_purge = 0;
8636 for(int i=src->size-1; i>=0; i--) {
8637 taObjDiffRec* rec = src->FastEl(i);
8638 if(rec->n_diffs == 0) { // easy -- lets see what that does..
8639 src->RemoveIdx(i);
8640 n_purge++;
8641 continue;
8642 }
8643 }
8644 return n_purge;
8645}
